* Underhålla och förbättra befintliga datamodeller för att säkerställa skalbarhet, prestanda och anpassning till affärsprocesser.
* Hjälpa till med utveckling och optimering av ETL-processer.
* Bidra till dokumentationen av data härkomst, styrning och affärsregler.


 Nödvändiga färdigheter
   

  

* Stark SQL-kunskap.
* Stark erfarenhet av datamodellering, särskilt av att utforma normaliserade modeller för kärndatalager och star-scheman för rapportering av marts.
* Gedigen förståelse för datalagringskoncept och best-practice
* Utmärkt analytisk och problemlösande förmåga.


 Meriterande färdigheter
   

  

* Kunskaper om Azure Databricks och/eller notebook-drivna miljöer.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling av Power BI-rapporter.
* Kunskap om Python eller andra programmeringsspråk som används inom dataanalys är ett plus.


 Personlighet
   

  

 Då utvecklingsteamen arbetar verksamhetsnära är förmågan till goda relationer samt stort intresse för övriga delar av Apollo viktigt. Apollo andas och lever tillsammans, lagandan är tydlig och man utmanar gärna varandra positivt för att nå framgång. Branschen och Apollo är snabbrörliga, agila och så även du. Vidare är du en nyfiken social och kreativ lagspelare, kompetent, kommunikativ och stolt över ditt yrkeskunnande. Du delar med dig av din kunskap, är bra på att ge och ta konstruktiv feedback samt mån om att arbeta med kontinuerlig förbättring av såväl dig själv som verksamheten.
   

  

 Vårt erbjudande
   

  

 Apollo erbjuder en stimulerande och kreativ arbetsmiljö med varierande arbetsuppgifter som du har stor möjlighet att påverka. Vi har en platt organisation som uppmuntrar samarbete, kommunikation och delande av idéer inom och mellan olika avdelningar på Apollo. Vi erbjuder en arbetsplats där affären är viktigt samtidigt som vi har roligt och en bra balans mellan jobb och privatliv. Frågar vi våra utvecklare så beskrivs vi som en organisation där du uppmanas och har utrymme att lyfta idéer kring hemsidan eller teknikval. Vi ser också till att faktiskt testa nya tekniker vilket gör att vi ständigt utvecklas och utmanas, tillsammans i teamen! Utöver detta kommer du givetvis att erbjudas riktigt bra deals på resor utöver redan schyssta förmåner!
   

  

 Kontakt & Ansökan
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Aliby - The Pink Company. Då intervjuer och urval sker löpande ber vi dig att inte vänta med att skicka in ditt CV. Vid intresse vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult. Omar Burazerovic 0728–897441 / Lars Ohlson 0705-888175.
   

  

 Om Apollo
   

  

 Apollo är en branschledande researrangör som underlättat för skandinaver att komma ut i världen, först med resor till Grekland till att nu kunna erbjuda hela världen till våra kunder. Vi gör det genom vårt charterbolag Apollo, men även genom våra systerbolag Xtravel, Golf Plaisir, Out of Bounds och Lime Travel. Med mer än 35 år i branschen så fortsätter vi att växa och söker därför efter fler kompetenta IT-medarbetare som tillsammans med oss vill skapa resebranschens bästa kundresa, oavsett om den sker digitalt eller på en sandstrand i Grekland. Sedan 2015 är Apollo en del av den privatägda tyska koncernen REWE med över 300 000 medarbetare. REWE är stora inom dagligvaruhandel, sällanköp, reseindustrin, med mera. En stark ägare som även har fler andra resebolag i Europa inom koncernen som vi samarbetar med.

title: Senior Interaktionsdesigner
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 I rollen kommer konsulten, tillsammans med ytterligare en UX-designer och flera utvecklingsteam ansvara för tjänsterna som utvecklas blir estetiskt tilltalande, lätta att använda och tillgängliga för användarna. Tjänsterna innefattar både handläggningssystem och externa webbtjänster för allmänheten.
   

  

 Utvecklingsverksamheten är organiserad i ett tåg bestående av åtta team med olika ansvarsområden.
   

  

 Vi lägger just nu mycket vikt på att etablera nya arbetssätt där vi utgår från insikter från användarna när vi tar designbeslut. Konsulten behöver vara öppen för att driva kundperspektivet framåt i utvecklingsteamen och bör därför ha en pedagogisk förmåga att kommunicera genom tal, skrift, wireframes och prototyper. Vi arbetar även aktivt med att etablera tydliga riktlinjer för utvecklingsteamen när det gäller visuell design där konsultens roll kommer att bli viktig.
   

  

 Konsulten ska ha flerårig praktisk arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med UI-design/visuell design. Ska vara van vid att samarbeta med andra roller, så som utvecklare, kravanalytiker, produktägare och testare.
   

  

 Som designer är konsulten noggrann och ser till att skisserna är pixelperfekta innan de lämnas över till utvecklingsteamen.
   

  

 Konsulten har kunskap och förståelse och kan därmed omsätta principerna inom Design thinking-processen i sitt arbete.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta utifrån en designprocess
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att utveckla wireframes och prototyper i Figma
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med att tillämpa WCAG
* Har 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av praktiskt arbete utifrån ett designsystem
* Minst 2 arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta i en agil struktur


**Meriterande**
* Har jobbat som frontend-utvecklare (Angular)
* Har praktisk erfarenhet av att införa ett designsystem i ett utvecklingsteam/tåg


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 23-10-2024
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, AI, Machine Learning, Test, Cloud, Infra DevOps, , IT-Projektledning.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Omnichannel Experience Leader
description:
**Job ID:** R0009565


**Date posted:** 17/10/2024


Through creativity, IKEA marketing & Communication AB connects the heart of IKEA to the hearts and minds of the many people. We plan and produce marketing and communication that enables our retail markets to grow and to position IKEA as a purpose-led business and an expert in the life at home.


We are in Älmhult – the heart of IKEA. Our strength is our 400+ talented co-workers: strategists, channel experts, developers, photographers, motion media producers, 3D artists, graphic designers, copywriters, interior designers, and many more competences. We are proud of our craftsmanship and ability to unleash creativity at scale.


The core of our offer is the so-called Common content that is made available to all IKEA retailers. On top of that, we offer additional packages and on-request support to meet the varying needs of the markets. We also develop the common marketing agenda for IKEA, leading in marketing & communication topics and contributing to our business strategies.


IKEA Marketing & Communication Strategy & Plan spearheads the IKEA marketing and communication agenda creating growth, nurturing the IKEA brand over time, and inspires even more of the many people to create a better life at home.

**We are now looking for Omnichannel Experience Leaders** with experience in UX research, Search Engine Optimization and data & analytics to secure we optimize the communication we deliver based on understanding the consumer needs and omnichannel landscape.


Job Description


As Omnichannel Experience Leader you will:

* Define and lead the strategic omnichannel marketing and communication agenda in cooperation with other leaders
* Identify channel and consumer experience trends and ensure that omnichannel content development is driven by actionable insights
* Be responsible for defining and feeding in relevant omnichannel experience input to IMC assignments and development initiatives
* Establish new ways of working for impactful and cost-efficient management of omnichannel experience input
* Lead or co-lead omnichannel development and testing initiatives together with internal and external stakeholders and channel/platform owners
* Manage the roadmap and stakeholders in your leadership area
* Act as a role model regarding IKEA Culture, values and code of conduct

You are inspired by our vision to create a better everyday life for the many people and believe that Marketing & Communication will contribute to growing the IKEA business and brand. You have an interest in life at home and home furnishing and feel passionate about understanding behaviour, people, and the future as well as energy to learn and develop every day.


You have senior experience in developing and implementing global marketing and communication initiatives for large businesses and brands. You have extensive strategic understanding of the IKEA Concept and value chain (Retail, Range and Supply).  

You lead with a visionary and inspirational approach and are skilled in communication and change management. You have a strong ability to build trust and strong working relationships across a wide diversity of people on all levels in the organization and you can conceptualize complex issues to generate buy-in and drive decisions and consensus.


IMC is a place where you can focus on doing what you love. There are no dress codes or closed offices. No day is ever the same. All ideas are welcome. Everyone tries to pitch in when needed, and failures are seen as a way of learning. When you enter our building, we want you to feel that you can inspire billions of people all over the world.


Our values and culture in IKEA serve as built-in compass, guiding us every day in everything we do. We become better together when we build on each other's strengths and differences. We strive to creating a work environment where we all feel safe and a sense of belonging, and are successful because we feel welcomed, respected, supported, and appreciated for who we are and for what we contribute with.


This is a permanent role based in Älmhult, Sweden.


Your role as Omnichannel Experience Leader is crucial for developing our business, so we believe that your presence with the team and working the majority of the time in the office is important.

 **More Information**  

Are you ready to make a better everyday life for the many people? We want to hear from you! Note that we don’t accept applications through email. **Apply no later than 1 November** by registering your CV and answer below three questions:

* What makes this role interesting for you?
* Why do you think you have a good fit for this role? Elaborate around experience, personal skills and leadership capabilities.
* How do you see that IKEA marketing and communication can be made better by making it more relevant for the consumers in the channels they meet us in across the world?


If you have any questions regarding the position, please contact Pontus Sjöberg (pontus.sjoberg1@inter.ikea.com) For questions regarding the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact Christina Appelqvist (christina.appelqvist1@inter.ikea.com)
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Konsultuppdrag | fullstack .Net / Angular frontend fokus
description:
Start: 12/02/2024  

End: 06/30/2025  

Target rate 950 sek/H  

Hybrid work is possible: At least one day per week from the office  

  

For this assignment you will work in a dynamic environment where innovation is part of your DNA. As a Agile Engineer – Senior Fullstack Software Engineer you will play a central role in designing and developing applications with strong focus on customer experience based on top modern technologies and architecture.  

  

You will have a wide scope of responsibility and freedom to affect what is being developed and in what way. You will have the opportunity to test out new technologies and concepts in order to deliver what brings most value to our customers.  

  

You will be working in an Agile DevOps team and collaborate with business colleagues at Business to Business Sales.  

  

Responsibilities:  

  

* Facilitate and enable the best possible solution design and technical solution to be implemented from an end to end customer experience perspective
* Use your in-depth knowledge about the product technical setup and usage of a product to continuously iterate and deliver on product improvements together with your peers and Product Owner
* Ensure that our solutions are secure, robust and sustainable
* Facilitate collaboration with Engineers, Product Owner and UX designer to translate requirements to user stories and into technical solutions
* Culture a first-rate software development practices to continuously ship high quality features and improvements
* You use, advocate and spread modern agile software development methodologies and help develop good standard engineering practices in your team and in our developer communities

Skills:
* Experience (+ 6years) of:

  

Angular (version 14 and up), HTML5, CSS, TypeScript, Azure DevOps, Git & Gitflow, MS Azure, MS Visual Studio  

  

Experienced in:  

  

C# (.NET Framework + .NET Core 7 and up)  

  

* If you have used SonarQube and Github Advance even better!

  

* You know how to translate product and business goals into technical solutions

  

* You have a University degree in Information Technology and Engineering

  

* You have worked as a Full Stack developer 5+ years and IT-architecture experience is a plus

  

* You speak Swedish and English fluently both oral and written
**Om oss**

*Senterprise Consulting är ett eget affärsområde inom Senterprise Sverige och är en ledande oberoende förmedlare av frilansande konsulter.*  

*Genom aktiv headhunting och search och en omfattande teknisk förståelse hjälper Senterprise Sverige de främsta arbetsgivarna att hitta de mest lämpade kandidaterna för både anställning och konsultbehov.*  

*Läs vidare på* *www.senterprise.se*

title: Communication Documentation Specialist
description:
Design 17 oktober 2024
**Communication Documentation Specialist**
==========================================


Skilled Documentation Specialist



Period: 11 nov – 11 maj 2025 part time 50%  

Location: Stockholm, Kungsholmen, on site



Following tools: standard Microsoft Office Suite, SharePoint, Power Automate and Power BI.


We are seeking a skilled documentation specialist to join our team and support the development of clear, user-friendly guidelines for our employee communications ecosystem. This role will involve documenting internal processes for a variety of users, from administrators to editors and new users, with varying expertise levels.


The ideal candidate will have strong technical knowledge and the ability to translate complex processes into clear, concise and accessible documentation. This role requires excellent communication skills in English and familiarity with the following tools: standard Microsoft Office Suite, SharePoint, Power Automate and Power BI.


Key responsibilities:  

– Document and create best practice guidelines for internal use, addressing both technical and non-technical audiences.  

– Develop process maps, flowcharts and other visual aids to clearly communicate workflows.  

– Ensure documentation is accessible, user-friendly and tailored to different expertise levels.  

– Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure thorough and accurate documentation.  

– Assist with training and onboarding materials (written or video) to support new users and facilitate adoption of tools.  

– Help ensure we adhere to data privacy, security and accessibility standards.  

– Stay updated on relevant tool developments and ensure guidelines evolve accordingly.


Qualifications:  

– Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and SharePoint (must); Power Automate and Power BI experience (is a plus).  

– Proven experience in technical writing, process documentation or a similar role.  

– Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical audiences in clear and simple language.  

– Familiarity with UX design principles and accessibility best practices.  

– Experience with process mapping tools is advantageous.  

– Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.  

– Understanding of data privacy and security in a corporate setting.

title: Software Engineer (Teamcenter) at Volvo Cars
description:
**We’re creating our own future**


At Volvo Cars, we are making bold digital visions come true. We aim to be the leader in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making our customers' lives less complicated. What we all have in common at Volvo Cars is our passion for protecting lives, our endless curiosity, and our dedication to create a new future for the automotive industry. Our human centric focus is what separates us from all other car companies.

  


**Looking for more than a job?**


A job with meaning is more than a job. Creating the kind of positive change, we’re planning will need the skills of the world’s most talented people. In this role, you’ll have the opportunity to affect your future and that of millions of others in ways you may never have thought possible. Curious? We hope so.

  

  

**What you’ll do**


At Volvo Cars, we are making bold digital visions come true. We aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making our customers' lives less complicated. Now we are looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.  

The PLM Core cluster consists of cross-functional teams with end-to-end responsibility for concepts, development, UX, methods/processes, and support within the PLM area and in the Teamcenter platform.


You will work in a team that focus on building solutions and on maintaining, optimizing, and improving our users’ daily digital workplace. You contribute to a business and technical blueprint and customize the respective Software Package. You may also be responsible for unit testing, contribute to integration testing, and/or be responsible for the design and delivery of end-user training.

  


**What you ‘ll bring**


* 10+ years of experience


* Active Workspace customization experiencece in designing and developing solutions with Teamcenter.


* Knowledge of Teamcenter unified Architecture 4 tier and 2 Tier architecture.


* Experience from Teamcenter 11 or above


* Very good understanding of Teamcenter Data Model


* 4 Years of experience in Teamcenter Server side coding


* Good understanding of IT technologies used in engineering standard space


* Experience with Teamcenter Administration and BMIDE update/deployment


* **Experience implementing**


* Structure Manager
* Release & Change Management
* Document Management
* Workflows
* Active Workspace
* Access Manager
* Classification
* Manufacturing Process Planner
* Experience implementing integrations with downstream applications
* Experience of REST APIs.
* PLM Functional and Testing expertise
* User problem solving experience
* DevOps + Automation experience
* Agile mindset and way of project execution
* Very good skills in Business Analysis, Business Knowledge, Automated Testing, Architecture Knowledge, and Technical Solution Design
* Fluent in English with strong communication/presentation skills
* Creative, innovative, and proactive team player

  




**Want to know more?**


We welcome you to apply in English by 10/31/24 the latest. Please apply through the provided link. Applications submitted via email will not be retained or taken into consideration. Once you receive a confirmation email from the system, your application will be acknowledged.


If you have any inquiries about the role, please reach out to hiring manager Niklas Engblom at niklas.engblom@volvocars.com. For questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact recruiter Sanghamitra Deb at Sanghamitra.deb@volvocars.com

  


  

**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**Who are you? And how can you make an impact?**
------------------------------------------------


Are you a seasoned UX designer with a passion for creating exceptional user experiences? We are seeking a highly skilled and creative individual to join our team as a Senior UX Designer. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in shaping the user journey for our digital products. With a focus on innovation and user-centric design, you will lead projects from concept to execution, ensuring that our products not only meet but exceed user expectations. If you are a strategic thinker, possess a wealth of experience in UX design, and thrive in a collaborative environment, we invite you to bring your talents to our dynamic team. You thrive in a collaborative environment, where you contribute to a friendly and supportive team while also engaging with the broader UX Chapter within Volvo Digital and IT, benefiting from knowledge sharing and other activities.

**Responsibilities:**
---------------------

* Execute a range of UX activities across our platforms, ensuring the delivery of valuable, desirable and intuitive solutions.
* Utilize your design skills to visualize concepts, ensuring that abstract ideas are translated into tangible and impactful designs.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to reimagine and improve user interfaces, enhancing the overall user experience.
* Take charge of managing stakeholders, understanding their requirements, and aligning design solutions with business goals.
* Communicate effectively with diverse teams, facilitating collaboration and ensuring a well defined design process.
* Contribute to the development and implementation of design best practices and methodologies.
* Oversee the end-to-end design process, from ideation to implementation, ensuring the highest quality in design execution. ·
* Ensure that work is delivered in accordance with set guidelines and appointed design system.
* Ensure compliance with best practice standards (UX, brand, design system, relevant legal and accessibility standards etc., and secure optimal implementation.
* Mentor, provide constructive feedback and guide the development of other designers.
* Actively participate in the larger UX Chapter within Volvo Digital and IT, contributing to knowledge sharing initiatives and engaging in collaborative activities.
**Qualifications:**
-------------------

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field such as Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, User Experience, or a related discipline.
* 5+ years of professional experience in UX design.
* Demonstrated experience in leading and managing UX projects from concept to delivery.
* Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of successful design projects across different platforms and devices.
* Ability to present and articulate design decisions to both designers and non-designers.
* Familiarity with design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite

  

Join us at Volvo, where your expertise will shape the future of user experiences within a global, innovative company.

**This is us, your new colleagues**
-----------------------------------


The User Experience Design Chapter in Digital Delivery collaborates with other parts of the organization, to foster an environment where ideas, thoughts and opinions can be shared. We are team players with common ambitions, and we win together by uncovering user needs through collected data and inputs to improve the usability of products and services across the Volvo Group. Our UX Design Chapter team are tasked with securing consistent user experience, interaction and visual treatment across products and services, considering a cohesive holistic experience that is findable, credible, accessible, useful, useable, and desirable. Ready to shape tomorrow’s society together with us? Are you as passionate about making an impact by design as we are? Are you thriving in a large complex organization, happy to collaborate and facilitate an excellent user centric approach in order to amplify the value of design?

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Software Engineer Fullstack @ Quiddly
description:
Software Engineer Fullstack @ Quiddly - part of the Blingdale Group
  
Join the transactional revolution! Quiddly is on a mission towards transactional transcendence! With us, you will be at the forefront in fintech. You will have the opportunity to work with the latest technology in a fast paced startup environment.
  
Quiddly builds a platform for invoice service, factoring and debt collection where we streamline operational processes and modernize the payment flow. You will join the expansion of our platform as we grow. Sounds good? Keep reading!
  
  

**What you will be doing:**  

Design client-side and server-side architecture.
  
Build front-end UX by best practice
  
Implementing effective and performant API’s
  
Implement system-integrations
  
Build functional and integration tests
  
**Maintenance:** Troubleshooting, debugging and patching
  
Perform code reviews
  
Work closely with the Developing team, our VPE and Product Owner.
  
  

**We offer you:**  

Allocation in our Options Program Remote work up to 40% of your working hours Select your own equipment from preferred supplier 6 weeks prepaid vacation Occupational pension according to ITP plan Parental leave pay in connection with parental leave Insurance & annual health check Wellness allowance of 4,000 SEK / year Paid parking just outside our office Bicycle benefit for those who prefer to commute by bike Breakfast & Fika - Crackers and fika are always close at hand Join regular after works and happenings! Ping Pong til you drop in our internal table tennis league Team spirit - become part of a tight and successful team Saas & Fintech - two of the hottest industries on the market A development plan for you as an individual Great career opportunities within the Blingdale Group
  
  

Who are you?
  
  

**To be successful in the role you will need:**  

**Experience as a Fullstack Developer, preferably with:** React
  
Python, flask framework (alternatively. C#, Java or .Net experience and a desire to learn Python w/ flask!)
  
  

Experience with PostgreSQL or other equivalent SQL database
  
Speak and write fluently in English and Swedish
  
  

**Bonus if you have one or more of the following:**  

Experience with Google Cloud, alternatively AWS or Azure
  
DevOps experience, IAC w/ K8s
  
Technical support experience and the ability to have conversations with customers
  
MSc Computer Science (Civilingenjör Datateknik).
  
  

These are not strict requirements - if you are great at what you do, your application is always welcome!
  
We also belive that you are a driven problem solver capable of working at the pace of a start-up. You are accustomed to working independently and taking ownership of your work. You are analytical, thorough and a fast learner.
  
  

Site and language
  
Hybrid, On-site in Malmö, minimum 3 days a week.We have an office in central Malmö and encourage our employees to come in to collaborate in person. But, we also understand if you want to sit and code for a few days without interruptions therefore we have a hybrid-work model.
  
We speak English in the development organization. Swedish is the primary language at the office and for the rest of the organization.
  
  

About Quiddly
  
Quiddly, which is part of the Blingdale Group, is a software company that licenses and develops platforms for credit and invoice management. We are currently offering modules for invoicing, factoring and debt collection, payment solutions,and our integration engine Squidd. We own, develop and maintain all source code, while focusing on scalable, secure and flexible system architecture.
  
Quiddly’s concept is simple, but the solutions are advanced. Our customers can pick and choose from our presets to lay the foundation for a new fintech product. Everything is state of the art modular technology that integrates with all types of systems.

title: User Researcher
description:
Brinner du för användarinsikter, är analytiskt lagd och trivs med att arbeta i en föränderlig och kreativ miljö?


Då kan rollen som User Researcher på Aller Media vara något för dig!

### **Om rollen**


Som User Researcher på Aller Media får du en central roll i att skapa användarcentrerade produkter och tjänster. Tillsammans med produktteam, designers och utvecklare säkerställer du att våra digitala lösningar bygger på verkliga användarbehov. Du kommer att genomföra användarundersökningar och analyser, och dina insikter kommer att spela en avgörande roll i att forma framtidens digitala upplevelser hos oss. Genom användartester, intervjuer och andra researchmetoder hjälper du oss att skapa användarvänliga produkter och tjänster.

##### **I rollen ingår även att:**

* Genomföra användartester och analyser för att förstå hur våra produkter används.
* Samarbeta nära designers och produktägare för att integrera användarfeedback i produktutvecklingsprocessen.
* Analysera och tolka researchdata för att ge insiktsfulla och användbara rekommendationer.
* Presentera och sprida användarinsikter internt för att säkerställa att våra beslut baseras på verkliga användarbehov.

### **För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du:**

* Har relevant utbildning inom UX, beteendevetenskap eller liknande område.
* Har 3-5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med UX-research.
* Är van vid att genomföra både kvalitativa och kvantitativa undersökningsmetoder.
* Har ett analytiskt sinne och kan omsätta data till agerbara rekommendationer.
* Trivs med att samarbeta och kommunicera insikter på ett tydligt och engagerande sätt.
* Är självgående och gillar att ta egna initiativ och driva projekt framåt.


Du kommer att ingå i vårt Insightsteam som arbetar nära vår kommersiella avdelning, redaktioner, produkt, utveckling och design för att säkerställa att våra tjänster och produkter möter användarnas behov. Teamet är en central del av Aller Medias digitala satsning och arbetar med alla våra starka varumärken som tex Femina, Allas, Måbra, ELLE och Svensk Dam.

  


### **Vad vi erbjuder**


Vi har nyligen övergått till en gemensam nordisk organisationsstruktur och våra samarbeten inom Aller Media Nordic öppnar upp för värdefulla internationella erfarenheter.


Du kommer att arbeta i ett företag i ständig utveckling, där ingen dag är den andra lik. Det är en kreativ miljö där allt är möjligt. Här har vi en nyfiken tillsammanskultur där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål och stöttar varandra.

  

Hos oss får du arbeta mot en tydlig vision – att göra svenska kvinnors liv rikare. Aller Media i Sverige har nått all-time high resultat de senaste åren i en utmanande marknad med en vinst på över 100 miljoner SEK förra året.

### **Ansök!**

Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med tillträde omgående. Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. Dina personliga egenskaper är viktiga för oss så vi använder tester tidigt i processen.


Vi utvärderar kandidater löpande och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag. Ansök redan idag - och inte senare än den 30e oktober.

##### **Har du frågor om tjänsten eller företaget?**


Kontakta:

* Carolina Månsson, Head of Insights på carolina.mansson@aller.com
* HR-kontakt Frida Hamark på frida.hamark@aller.com

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Junior Visual Designer (Remote)
description:
**Launch your career in visual design with Kreativstorm, a leading management-consulting firm based in Berlin, Germany. Work remotely with our multinational team and create visually compelling designs!**
 Do you have an eye for detail and a passion for creating beautiful visuals? Kreativstorm is seeking a talented Junior Visual Designer to join our creative team. You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, from branding and marketing materials to digital and print media. Your designs will play a crucial role in shaping our clients' brands and communication strategies.
   

  

**Job Overview and Details:**
* Location: Fully Remote
* Position: Full-Time


**Requirements**
**Ideal Candidates:**
* Pursuing or having a degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
* Junior visual designers with a strong portfolio showcasing their design skills.
* Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite).
* Creative thinkers who thrive in collaborative environments.


**Your Role:**
* Create visual content for digital and print media.
* Collaborate with the design team on branding and marketing materials.
* Assist in developing illustrations and layouts.
* Bring innovative design solutions to projects.
* Document and present design concepts and solutions.


**Benefits**
**Why Join Us?** 
 Kreativstorm provides an innovative and creative environment. You will be part of a dynamic team that values artistic expression and excellence. Our projects span various industries, offering a rich tapestry of creative challenges. Join us to enhance your design skills, build an impressive portfolio, and work on exciting projects that make a real impact.
   

  

**Apply now and pave the way for your future in visual design!**

title: UX & Merchandising Specialist to Samsung
description:
As UX & Merchandising Specialist at Samsung you'll plan, execute, and follow up on key product launches, campaigns, and always-on communication across Samsung.com in Sweden, Denmark, Norway, and Finland. You'll develop sales-driven merchandising to highlight products, upsell, and cross-sell. Join our evolving, data-driven team focused on continuous improvement.
   

  

**The job as UX & Merchandising Specialist TV and sound**
 In this position, you will oversee the planning, execution, and follow-up of essential activities related to product launches, campaigns, and continuous communications on Samsung.com for our markets in Sweden, Denmark, Norway, and Finland. Additionally, you will develop and implement merchandising strategies designed to package and present relevant products, promoting upsell and cross-sell opportunities on our platform.
   

  

**Example of tasks**
* Plan and execute e-commerce launches on relevant channels. This is a team effort involving thewhole D2C team and our Korean and European offices, which contribute the initial ideas.
* Work closely with Ecom, Marketing communication, CRM and SEO to secure the full customer journey has a red thread
* Continuously analyzing consumer behavior, you will work closely with the analytics, Customer Experience team, SEO and other functions in the digital team to evaluate and identify insights and opportunities.
* Plan and execute e-commerce promotions. This includes tracking your Merchandise plan, creating mock-ups and user journeys, and, of course, keeping your stakeholders aligned.
* Work closely with our agency in Poland, requesting updates on our sites.


**Who Are You**
 We are looking for a highly organized professional with excellent communication and adaptability skills. You will plan and execute tasks efficiently, ensure customer satisfaction, and confidently engage with others. The role also requires the ability to handle change and manage pressure effectively.
   

  

 Additionally, you have expertise in the following software:
   

  

* MS Office
* Jira
* Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
* Figma
* Photoshop
* Content Square
* Fluency in English & Swedish (any additional nordic languages is a bonus)


**Most Relevant Previous Work Experience**
 We seek a candidate with a passion for retail and digital sales and go-to-market experience. You should have a background in digital marketing, offers, and campaigns and be skilled in managing multiple stakeholders in a fast-paced environment. Experience in data-driven initiatives, customer journeys, and sales-focused UX is essential to driving success and growth.
   

  

**Good to know**
 This is a full-time permanent position located at the Samsung office in Kista.
   

  

 Please apply through the “Apply now” button, upload your CV, and answer some questions. We do not want a cover letter. We are actively reviewing applications, so apply as soon as possible. Due to the GDPR, we can’t accept applications through email.
   

  

 If you have any questions, please contact Erik Värendh at erik.varendh@hammerhanborg.com
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

*At Hammer & Hanborg we make a difference between being competent and being the right person for a job. Competence is much more than a CV and we always match candidates based on potential, values and motivation. We think it’s important that it’s fun to work and we believe in collaboration based on trust and mutual respect. We strive to always encourage and challenge both ourselves and our clients to have the courage to develop and make change happen. We believe that Diversity and Inclusion are strengths and welcome all applicants. Together we create future professional life. You are welcome to join us. Please read more: hammerhanborg.com*

title: Service Designer for Ventures and New Business
description:
**About Us**
 Everyone working at Scania is united by a common purpose: Driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. We know that the transport industry must change, and it’s a change we want to lead. Scania’s continuous transformative work within circularity, electrification and autonomy shows commercial ideas, powerful insights and competencies that make real change happen.
   

  

 Ventures and New Business at Scania have a key role in driving the shift and contributing to this vision. We develop and deliver new businesses, supporting Scania’s long-term growth and profitability ambitions. At Ventures and New Business, we develop complementing solutions to our core and build new growth through ventures and investments that strengthen and support our acceleration, driving the shift. We want to engage and inspire our entire organisation to create results together with us, and collaboration and entrepreneurial spirit are part of our culture and what makes us successful.
   

  

 We are today a team of approximate 45+ people and have five ventures. Our office space is very central at Drottninggatan in Stockholm.
   

  

**Job Description**
 In the role as Service Designer, you will play a crucial role in enhancing user experiences by designing and optimising services across various touchpoints. Your focus will be on understanding user needs, identifying pain points, and creating seamless, efficient, and enjoyable service journeys.
   

  

 Reporting to our Customer Domain Manager, you will be aligned with one of our ventures while also working closely with other colleagues within your domain to share expertise and best practices.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

 In the role of Service Design your main key tasks will be:
   

  

  

* Conduct user research to gather insights into customer behaviors, needs, and pain points.
* Map and analyse existing service processes and user journeys to identify areas for improvement.
* Design and prototype innovative service solutions that enhance user experiences and meet business objectives.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX designers, and developers, to implement service design solutions.
* Develop service blueprints, personas, journey maps, and other design artifacts to communicate ideas and solutions.
* Facilitate workshops and co-creation sessions with stakeholders to align on service vision and objectives.
* Continuously evaluate and iterate on service designs based on user feedback and performance metrics.


**About You**
 We seek someone with strong experience within Service Design who will work with the full process. You are a goal-oriented doer and a team player that enjoy being part of a growth journey.
   

  

 We also believe that you (requirements):
   

  

  

* Have +5 years of experience from a similar role within a consultancy firm or within a successful start-up.
* Are proficient in applying user-centered design principles to create services that meet the needs and expectations of end-users.
* Posses strong skills in developing service blueprints to map out all elements of service delivery, including customer interactions, processes, and systems.
* Can collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders, including customers, employees, and management, to gather insights and ensure alignment.
* Have competence in understanding and designing complex service systems, including the relationships between various service components and processes.
* Bring experience in creating prototypes of service concepts and conducting user testing to validate and refine service designs.
* Demonstrate strong problem-solving abilities to identify service gaps and innovate new service solutions that enhance the overall user experience.
* Have excellent communication skills, with the ability to clearly articulate service design concepts and visualise them through diagrams, sketches, and models.
* Have a strategic perspective and operational attention to detail.
* Hold relevant educational qualifications.
* Are fluent in English.


 What we offer:
   

  

 We offer you the chance to be part of an organisation that is focused on reaching Scania’s targets and truly driving the shift to a sustainable transport system. Joining our team you will get to enjoy the flexibility and agility of a startup enviroment while benefiting from the stability and security of being employed by one of Sweden's largest companies. With the opportunities of the current transformative changes within the transport industry, we are on a very exciting journey. This is the right time to join us!
   

  

 Information and application
   

  

 Questions about the role? Contact Linda.rosenqvist@scania.com
   

  

 We are working with an ongoing selection; please apply as soon as possible if you are interested, but no later than 2024-10-31.
   

  

 Kindly note that a background check might be conducted for this position.
   

  

*Scania is one of Sweden's largest companies and offers trucks and buses for heavy transport in combination with a wide range of product-related services. Our mission is to drive the transition to a sustainable transport system by developing safe, smart and energy-efficient transport solutions that are better for both people and our planet. Today, Scania have around 50,000 employees in around 100 countries. For more information visit Scania.com*

title: UX & Merchandising Specialist till Samsung!
description:
Vill du jobba med ett av världens mest kända varumärken? Vi söker en UX & Merchandising Specialist som vill skapa enastående köpupplevelser för Samsungs nordiska kunder. Sök nu, urvalet sker löpande!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Samsung
 



  

**Plats :**
 Kista
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Marketing / Information / Media
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, 40h/v
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som UX & Merchandising Specialist ansvarar du för att Samsungs digitala kanaler uppfyller kundernas förväntningar när det gäller att upptäcka, välja och köpa produkter. Du kommer att planera, genomföra och följa upp produktlanseringar och kampanjer på Samsung.com för Sverige, Danmark, Norge och Finland. Rollen är en mix av operativa uppgifter och strategiskt arbete i ett team som ständigt utvecklas.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* **Ett långsiktigt konsultuppdrag hos Samsung**
  
* **Möjlighet att utvecklas i din yrkesroll hos en branschledande aktör**
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Planera och genomföra e-handelslanseringar tillsammans med Samsungs D2C-team och deras kontor i Korea och Europa. Anpassa globala idéer för den nordiska marknaden.
  
* Samarbeta nära med e-handel, marknad, CRM och SEO för att skapa en sammanhängande kundresa.
  
* Analysera kundbeteenden och identifiera förbättringsmöjligheter tillsammans med Samsungs digitala team.
  
* Driva e-handelskampanjer: Hantera merchandisingplaner, skapa mockups och säkerställa att alla intressenter är med på tåget.
  
* Arbeta operativt genom att uppdatera webbplatsen i samarbete med Samsungs byrå i Polen och använda verktyget Jira.
  
* Hålla koll på marknadstrender och bidra med nya idéer till teamet.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har minst
   

**två års erfarenhet av digital försäljning, marknadsföring och e-handel**
 .
  
* Har erfarenhet av datadrivna initiativ för att driva och förbättra kundupplevelsen
  
* Har kunskaper i
   

**MS Office, Jira, Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), Figma, Photoshop**
 och
   

**Content Square**
 .
  
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på
   

**svenska och engelska**
 då båda språken används i ditt dagliga arbete
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med
   

**elektroniska konsumentvaror**
 .
  
* Tidigare arbete i
   

**stora globala organisationer**
 med flera marknader.
  
* Kan tala och skriva ytterligare nordiska språk
  


  


 Om du trivs i en snabb, föränderlig miljö och vill vara med och utveckla Samsungs e-handel i Norden, är detta rätt utmaning för dig!
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Philippa Backman eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv5@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107869

title: UX & Merchandising Specialist to Samsung
description:
**Location:** 
 Nordic region (Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland)
   

  

**About The Role**
 Now you can join Samsung, one of the world’s largest consumer electronics brands, as a UX & Merchandising Specialist. You’ll be responsible for ensuring that Samsung.com delivers an exceptional experience for consumers to discover, choose, and purchase products. Your key focus will be product launches, campaigns, and sales-driven merchandising, with a goal to drive performance across Samsung.com for the Nordic markets.
   

  

 In this role, you'll collaborate with teams across Ecom, Marketing, CRM, and SEO to enhance the customer journey and work closely with our agency in Poland for site updates. You’ll play a vital role in localizing strategies from our Korean and European offices and applying them to the Nordic market.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Plan and execute e-commerce product launches and promotions.
* Collaborate across teams to ensure a cohesive customer journey.
* Analyze consumer behavior and leverage insights to improve performance.
* Manage merchandise plans, create mock-ups, and communicate updates to stakeholders.
* Work with our agency in Poland to execute site changes via Jira.
* Stay on top of market trends and share insights with the team.


**Why You'll Love This Role:** 
 You’ll join an ambitious, fast-paced team where change is constant, and your contributions will shape the future of Samsung’s D2C business in the Nordics.
   

  

**Key Skills & Competencies**
* Strong organizational and execution skills.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities.
* Adaptable, proactive, and able to thrive in a dynamic environment.


**Qualifications & Experience**
* Experience in digital marketing, retail, or go-to-market strategies.
* Familiarity with tools like MS Office, Jira, AEM, Figma, Photoshop, and Content Square.
* Experience working with data-driven initiatives to improve sales.
* Previous experience in UX and customer journey design.
* Fluency in English and Swedish is required.


**Preferred Experience**
* Experience in the consumer electronics industry.
* Previous work in large global organizations.


 Join us to make an impact on one of the world's leading brands!
   

  

**About The Assignment, We Prefer Project Employment**
 For this assignment, you will be hired as a consultant by HIROY. We offer our consultants a generous package, and you will also become a part of our extensive network of agencies. This will provide you with the opportunity to deploy your skills and interact with our network of consultants.
   

  

 We often offer on an ongoing basis. This means that we sometimes remove the assignment from our website earlier than the application deadline. If you are interested in an assignment, we recommend that you apply immediately.
   

  

 Period: Contract: 11-Nov-2024 - 10-Nov-2029 until further notice
   

  

 Hybrid Model 100%
   

  

 Stockholm - Kista
   

  

**Vi har Nordens största utbud av erfarna digitala marknadsförare**
 Vi hjälper kunder som vill utveckla sina digitala kanaler, har ett föränderligt kompetensbehov samt söker 100% flexibla, skalbara och kostnadseffektiva lösningar som de själva kan styra över.

title: Product Design Manager, Post Booking Experience (Bangkok-based)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

****This role is BANGKOK-BASED, RELOCATION PROVIDED.****
**Getting to know our Agoda Design Team**
 Embark on a journey with the Agoda Design Team, a vibrant community of product designers crafting innovative solutions from the heart of Bangkok, Thailand, and Gurugram, India. As a pivotal force in our product-driven company, we collaborate closely with product managers and engineers to unravel customer challenges, shaping workflows, interactions, and visual interfaces. Whether you’re honing your craft, expanding your skillset, or stepping into a leadership role, now is the time to join a team that’s both scrappy and hands-on yet influential enough to drive change and shape product strategy. Be a part of Agoda’s Design team and contribute to unlocking the world for our global community of travelers.
   

  

**About Our Post Booking Experience Team**
 Our team is dedicated to revolutionizing the post-booking journey for our customers on our OTA platform. We are committed to providing seamless connectivity and personalized experiences that cater to every aspect of their travel journey. With a focus on user-friendliness and customization, we strive to create a cutting-edge post-booking platform that anticipates and fulfills our customers’ needs at every step of the booking process.
   

  

**The Product Design Manager, Post Booking Experience at Agoda is responsible for:**
 As Design Manager for our post booking experience team, you will help your product stakeholders to shape and execute the vision for both Agoda post booking consumer products and our agent tooling experience through design leadership and strategic contributions. Due to the high complexity and ambiguity of the CEG product domain, you’ll need to actively build connections with different function departments of the whole support business so that you will be able to provide great service to our customers and balance efficiencies for our agents. You’ll also be driving CEG user research strategies through deep understandings on both short term and long term business priorities.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll strike a delicate balance between user-centric design and business objectives. You’ll empower your team to advocate for the user while aligning their efforts with our overarching business goals and KPIs. Your influence will extend beyond the design realm as you champion the user and business needs, driving forward industry-leading UX solutions for our post booking experience products at Agoda.
   

  

 Join us in creating experiences that redefine the standard for consumer engagement and satisfaction in the travel industry.
   

  

**Day to day, it looks like:**
* Manage scope of work for your team, and you determine how to divide work amongst designers
* Leading design strategy for complex initiatives and growing design leaders
* Driving design vs business objectives and measurement alignment on core product initiatives that design team or product team drives
* You ensure successful execution by your team. You surface and address questions, bottlenecks, dependencies, and conflicts as they arise, working with stakeholders when needed. You ensure high quality design decisions are made
* You maintain and apply a process for effective design.
* You take steps to build a healthy, high performing, capability-complete team. You hire designers to fill open headcount. You foster a positive culture on your team
* You coach and mentor your direct reports to make sure they hone their competencies and grow in their careers
* Leading projects and groups to define and sell a coherent medium to long term vision, with milestones and short term actions to get there. Is building the design organization as a focus for wider company vision and strategy
* You represent your team upwards to your manager: you ensure the team’s priorities are well understood, you advocate for them, and you flag any underperformers, stakeholder misalignments, or other challenges they face
* Partnering with a design leadership team to help shape management practices, and mentoring other design leaders to put those in practice


**Product Design Manager at Agoda means you have a track record of:**
* Leading design strategy for complex initiatives and growing design leaders
* Leading through ambiguity, making use of your soft skills to persuade and build alignment with senior leaders around a vision and approach
* Using holistic thinking to identify customer experience opportunities that create impact across the organization
* Partnering with a design leadership team to help shape management practices, and mentoring other design leaders to put those in practice
* Incorporating advancements in the field of product design to guide the skills and practices of our team
* Developing a deep understanding of current native technologies and design patterns, and can guide your design team to use these in practice


**Qualities we value in design leaders:**
* Effective articulation of ideas and design solutions
* Expressing feedback with kindness and candor
* Tolerance for ambiguity and healthy curiosity
* Translation of quantitative & qualitative insights into design decisions
* Contribution to our culture: motivation, optimism, quality, integrity

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Technical SEO Specialist
company_industry: Marketing Services, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
Hi there 👋🏼 We’re looking for new SEO Specialist to join us this fall.
 



 We believe that a workplace should be a space where everyone feels welcome, no matter their background or unique perspectives. Simply put, we want people to enjoy working with us.
 



 NoA Connect/Bluebird is a part of The North Alliance – one of Scandinavia’s largest agency networks in design, media, and marketing. At NoA we believe that we are stronger together than as standalone agencies and that collaboration is the way to growth.
 



  





 Noa Connect has three business areas - Advisory, Performance (Bluebird) and Data & Analytics. This role is within Performance. With the combined capabilities of NoA and Bluebird we will be able to provide our clients with a true end-to-end solution with everything from brand strategy to performance marketing, and everything in between.
 



  





 The SEO team
 
 operates both strategically and hands-on with SEO on some of our key projects together with a team of specialists across the different business areas (SEM, Social, SEO, and Web analytics). They also play an integral part in business development both within SEO as well as other parts of the business.
 



  





**In short this is what you will be doing** 



* Continuously improve best practices for Technical SEO by developing existing ways of working and adapting to industry change
* Making sure best practices for Technical SEO are communicated and followed throughout the whole organization
* Lead the external communication including create or quality proof materials for workshops, seminars and Bluebird news for all matters related to Technical SEO
* Set and lead processes for quality assurance within the channel, both for ongoing delivery and audits for all related to Technical SEO
* On-boarding of product specialists in how we work with Technical SEO
* Manage the client relationship throughout the entire project lifecycle, ensuring seamless execution from initiation to completion
* Work closely to our Development Lead in developing our SaaS products and automate processes
* Work closely with our UX/UI Designer to set processes and find synergies between the two, as well implement this in our deliverables
* Liaise with sister companies within the group to foster a collaborative culture
* Ensure that we have a structured on-boarding process for specialists at different level of seniority to get new hires within the product area up and running as fast as possible



  





**We’d be thrilled if you can tick a majority of the following boxes:** 



* Several years relevant SEO experience with a strong grasp of best practices
* You are client-focused with a strategic approach to resolving issues.
* You have strong understanding of the entire digital media landscape
* Established experience in SEO processes, including quality assurance and audits.
* You are up-to-date on industry trends, adapting strategies as needed.
* Experience in onboarding and training new hires effectively.
* Enjoy working in a collaborative environment, fostering strong relationships across teams and sister companies within a larger group.



  





**A few things that we’ll provide you with as an employee here:** 



* Opportunity to expand and develop your digital marketing skills while working together with the most interesting client cases and passionate co-workers
* Excellent work-life balance with flexible hours and the possibility to work remotely
* Competitive salary package with benefits
* Pension



  





**Our recruitment process** 




 No need for a personal letter or a CV-document. Just provide us with the link to your LinkedIn profile and answer a few initial questions - that's it.
 



 After that, you will get the chance to talk to someone from the team and show off your marketing skills. This interview is all about your technical skills and your team fit. Let's do this!

title: Dokumentationsspecialist
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
 




 För vår kunds räkning söker vi en skicklig dokumentationsspecialist som ska stödja utvecklingen av tydliga och användarvänliga riktlinjer för kundens interna kommunikationssystem. Rollen innebär att dokumentera interna processer för en varierande användargrupp, från administratörer till redaktörer och nyanvändare med olika expertisnivåer. Den ideala kandidaten har stark teknisk kompetens och förmåga att översätta komplexa processer till tydlig, koncis och tillgänglig dokumentation.
 



 Beläggningen för denna tjänsten är 50%.
 






 Kvalifikationer
 



- Stark kunskap i Microsoft Office Suite och SharePoint.

- Dokumenterad erfarenhet av teknisk dokumentation, processdokumentation eller liknande roller.

- Förmåga att förklara tekniska koncept på ett enkelt och tydligt sätt för icke-tekniska användare.

- Kännedom om UX-designprinciper och bästa praxis för tillgänglighet.

- Erfarenhet av verktyg för processkartläggning är fördelaktigt.

- Starka organisatoriska färdigheter och uppmärksamhet på detaljer.

- Förståelse för dataskydd och säkerhet i en företagsmiljö.

- Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.

- Erfarenhet av Power Automate och Power BI är meriterande.


  








 Personliga egenskaper
   






 Vi söker dig som är noggrann, strukturerad och har en god förmåga att kommunicera både skriftligt och muntligt. Du är självgående, men trivs även med att samarbeta i tvärfunktionella team för att säkerställa att dokumentationen är heltäckande och korrekt. Du har ett öga för detaljer och kan anpassa ditt arbete för att möta behoven hos olika målgrupper.
 






 Företagspresentation
   


 Vår kund är ett globalt ledande företag som tillverkar hushållsapparater för att underlätta i vardagen. Vill du vara med och påverka morgondagens hushållsaparater, då är detta uppdragsgivaren för dig!
   




 När du blir en av oss
   


 Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.
 


 Lön
   


 Enligt överenskommelse.
 


 Tillträde och ansökan
   


 Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start 2024-11-11 och uppdraget förväntas löpa t.o.m. 2025-05-11 med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format).

title: Documentation Specialist | Jefferson Wells | Stockholm
company_industry: Electrical Equipment Manufacturing and Staffing and Recruiting
description:
Är du en driven dokumentationsspecialist med förmåga att skapa tydliga och användarvänliga riktlinjer? Vi på Jefferson Wells söker nu en kompetent dokumentationsspecialist med kunskap i Sharepoint för ett spännande konsultuppdrag hos vår kund i Stockholm. Vill du vara en del av ett dynamiskt team och bidra till vår kunds framgång? Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
 



  





  





**Ort:** 
 Stockholm
 



**Start:** 
 Omgående
 



**Uppdragslängd:** 
 Konsultuppdrag under cirka 1 år
 



  





  





**Om jobbet som Documentation Specialist:** 




  





 Som dokumentationsspecialist kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att utveckla och dokumentera interna processer. Du kommer att arbeta med både tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper och skapa best practice-riktlinjer som är lättförståeliga och tillgängliga. Ditt arbete kommer att inkludera:
 



  




* Dokumentera och skapa riktlinjer för internt bruk.
* Utveckla processkartor, flödesscheman och visuella hjälpmedel.
* Säkerställa att dokumentationen är användarvänlig och anpassad efter olika kunskapsnivåer.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att säkerställa korrekt och grundlig dokumentation.
* Assistera med utbildnings- och onboardingmaterial (skriftligt eller i videoformat).
* Hjälpa till att säkerställa att vi följer dataskydd, säkerhet och tillgänglighetsstandarder.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om relevanta verktygsutvecklingar och se till att riktlinjerna anpassas efter dessa.



  





  





**Den vi söker:** 




  





 Vi söker dig som har en stark teknisk kompetens och kan översätta komplexa processer till klar och lättfattlig dokumentation. Du ska ha goda kommunikationsfärdigheter i engelska och erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft Office, SharePoint, Power Automate och Power BI. För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du har:
 



  




* Stark kompetens inom Microsoft Office Suite och SharePoint; erfarenhet av Power Automate och Power BI är meriterande.
* Bevisad erfarenhet av tekniskt skrivande och processdokumentation eller en liknande roll.
* Förmåga att förklara tekniska koncept för icke-tekniska målgrupper på ett enkelt och klart sätt.
* Kännedom om UX-designprinciper och bästa praxis för tillgänglighet.
* Starka organisatoriska färdigheter och uppmärksamhet på detaljer.
* Förståelse för dataskydd och säkerhet i en företagsmiljö.

title: Documentation specialist to global appliance company!
description:
Do you have strong technical knowledge and the ability to translate complex processes into clear, concise and accessible documentation? On the behalf of our client we are now searching for a Documentation Specialist
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Kungsholmen, Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 11 November
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 On the behalf of our client, which is a successful international company, leader in the home and professional appliances markets with headquarters in Stockholm. We are seeking a skilled documentation specialist to join their team and support the development of clear, user-friendly guidelines for their employee communications ecosystem. This role will involve documenting internal processes for a variety of users, from administrators to editors and new users, with varying expertise levels.
   




**Work tasks**
  
* Document and create best practice guidelines for internal use, addressing both technical and non-technical audiences.
  
* Develop process maps, flowcharts and other visual aids to clearly communicate workflows.
  
* Ensure documentation is accessible, user-friendly and tailored to different expertise levels.
  
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure thorough and accurate documentation.
  
* Assist with training and onboarding materials (written or video) to support new users and facilitate adoption of tools.
  
* Help ensure we adhere to data privacy, security and accessibility standards.
  
* Stay updated on relevant tool developments and ensure guidelines evolve accordingly.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and SharePoint; Power Automate and Power BI experience is a plus.
  
* 1-2 years proven experience in technical writing, process documentation or a similar role.
  
* Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical audiences in clear and simple language.
  
* Familiarity with UX design principles and accessibility best practices.
  
* Experience with process mapping tools is advantageous.
  
* Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
  
* Understanding of data privacy and security in a corporate setting.
  
* Excellent communication skills in English
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Susanna Humbla or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv1@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107908

title: Frontendutvecklare med UX-erfarenhet till Sogeti Stockholm
description:
**Vill du skapa användarvänliga och visuellt tilltalande digitala upplevelser. Nu söker vi en erfaren Frontend Utvecklare med en stark känsla för design och UX!**
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet som frontend-utvecklare.
* Gedigen kunskap inom HTML, CSS och JavaScript.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med UX-design och UI-design, med ett öga för detaljer och användarcentrerade lösningar.
* Färdigheter i Figma eller andra designverktyg.
* Erfarenhet av moderna ramverk som React eller Angular.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med enhetstestning.
* Erfarenhet av att jobba med REST API och integrera frontend med backend-tjänster.
* Erfarenhet av att skapa responsiva och mobilanpassade gränssnitt för olika skärmar och enheter.
* Kunskap om WCAG och erfarenhet av tillgänglighetsoptimering, inklusive arbete med tillgänglighetsverktyg och tester.
* Erfarenhet av Design Thinking eller andra användarcentrerade designprocesser.
* Kunskap om att säkerställa cross-browser kompatibilitet, så att applikationer fungerar över olika webbläsare.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med designsystem eller komponentbibliotek som Material UI eller Bootstrap, eller att ha skapat anpassade komponenter.
* Vana att arbeta enligt agila metoder och uppskattar den typen av arbetsprocesser.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Universitetsutbildning inom relevant område (2–3 år) eller motsvarande erfarenhet.


**Som grädde på moset har du kanske erfarenhet eller intresse av:**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med testautomatisering och testdriven utveckling.
* Grundläggande kunskaper i SQL eller Python.
* Erfarenhet av backend-språk som Java eller C#.
* Erfarenhet av molnteknologier, som AWS eller Azure.


 Med ett starkt kundfokus och en lösningsorienterad inställning, är du redo att anta nya utmaningar. Som konsult behöver du vara flexibel och trivas i olika arbetsmiljöer, samt ha förmågan att bygga förtroende hos både kunder och kollegor vilket kommer vara en stor fördel i denna roll -
 **d** 
**et viktigaste vi har är nämligen du.**
 Som en del av Sogeti erbjuder vi dig en trygg anställning där vi prioriterar våra medarbetare och balans i livet. Vi värdesätter en positiv arbetsmiljö och strävar efter att skapa en atmosfär där du kan trivas och utvecklas.
   

  

 Gå med oss och låt oss koda framtiden tillsammans!
   

  

**Nyfiken på fler anledningar till att jobba hos oss? Kika in här:**
* Ditt Sogeti - Lär känna din framtida arbetsgivare!
* Dina förmåner - Få koll på vad vi erbjuder våra medarbetare!
* Medarbetarnöjdhet - Hur betygsätter våra egna sogetiare livet hos oss?


**Vad händer nu?**
 Ansök redan idag men senaste 4/11. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande.
   

  

 Hoppas vi ses!
   

  

 /Team Manager, Emma Hägg
