 En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

 På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.
   

  

 När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.
   

  

 Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/392 | Kontakt: Peter Wahlström, sektionschef peter.wahlstrom@skatteverket.se, Maria-Claudia Sun Han Cordova, hr-specialist maria-claudia.sun.han.cordova@skatteverket.se, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2024-10-07 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-27

title: Senior IT-drifttekniker i Microsoftmiljö sökes!
description:
Vi söker dig med en stark teknisk kompetens och en brinnande passion för att leverera värde genom stabil och säker IT. Här får du jobba med avancerade Microsoftlösningar både på server och klientnivå i en långsiktig tjänst.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, långsiktigt
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Så snart som möjligt
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vi söker dig med en stark teknisk kompetens och en brinnande passion för att leverera värde genom stabil och säker IT. Hos vår kund får du inte bara möjligheten att fortsätta utvecklas inom ditt område, utan också chansen att vara en nyckelspelare i vår kunds framgångssaga. Företaget är en organisation med ICT-lösningar i teknikens framkant och produkter och tjänster av hög kvalitet.
 


  


 Som IT-drifttekniker hos vår kund, kommer du att ingå i ett dedikerat team som har ansvaret för att sköta den tekniska förvaltningen och driften av kritiska sourcingtjänster. Genom att följa ITIL-standarden och använda din expertis inom konfiguration, drift och felsökning av IT-infrastruktur, kommer du att säkerställa att våra kunder upplever en sömlös och effektiv IT-drift.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En långsiktig tjänst som inleds som ett konsult uppdrag genom Academic Work men där tanken är att man blir anställd direkt hos företaget på sikt
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Djupgående erfarenhet av arbete med Windows Server OS i samtliga versioner
  
* Avancerade kunskaper i konfiguration och felsökning av Windows-operativsystem
  
* Kompetens inom Active Directory Services inklusive DNS, ADFS, NPS, PKI och certifikat
  
* Grundläggande kunskaper inom nätverksteknik
  
* Färdigheter i Script och PowerShell
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Certifieringar inom Microsoftprodukter
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* **Ansvarstagande**
  
* **Social**
  
* **Ordningsam**
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Nils Norgren eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107446

title: Microsoft Azure & Modern Workplace administrator
description:
Have you been working a few years with different parts of IT-support, Azure, M365, Intune and client administration and feel locked down by permission or hierarchy and have ambition to do more?
   

  

 Join our team as a Microsoft Azure/Modern Workplace Specialist and play a pivotal role in maintaining, configuring, and operating our clients systems.
   

  

 In this position, you'll be responsible for ensuring that the availability for users, performance, application availability, and security is delivered to a high standard together with a valued team.
   

  

 As a Microsoft Azure/Modern Workplace Specialist at Prog-It, you will guide and support our customers and colleagues in maximizing the benefits of using Microsoft's M365 & cloud services to unlock the potential of their workforce.
   

  

 You will coach customers on what they can do, how to do it, and what they get out of different digital work. You will also implement and configure the solutions, as well as continuously work with customers on improving and troubleshooting their Modern/Digital/Cloud workplace environment.
   

  

 Does this sound like an interesting challenge? Apply now!
   

  

**As our Microsoft Azure/Modern Workplace Specialist, you will have the opportunity to:** 
  

  

* Work with implementing configuring and troubleshoot all aspects of our M365 and Azure services delivery.
* Configure and maintain Azure AD identities and policies.
* Be able to troubleshoot Azure incidents at our customers.
* Monitor logs using M365 Security Center.
* Design Azure environments & implement them
* Install provision Manage endpoints and applications with Intune.
* Create, update, and enforce compliance & configuration policies.
* Deploy Microsoft Defender for Endpoint.
* Windows Autopilot Deployment to Automate device provisioning.
* Azure Active Directory Management, for example:
+ Implement & Manage user and identity solutions with Azure AD & Entra.
+ Configure Azure AD Identity Protection.


 At Prog-It we are an ambitious and hard-working team that enjoy working together to deliver a great service to our clients. To nurture ambition and talent we offer an inclusive workplace and everyday benefits and perks to maintain a healthy balance between delivery and well-being.
   

  

**To be a relevant applicant you need to have the following requirements:**
* +3 years working with M365 management or a Modern workplace support role.
* +3 years as Azure Administrator
* Basic grasp of Microsoft 365 components, including Office 365, SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Exchange Online.
* Basic awareness of Azure AD and identity concepts, covering user/group management, directory sync, and authentication.
* Proficiency with Microsoft Intune for endpoint management, software deployment, and security protocols.
* Having had exposure to cybersecurity principles, encompassing user access, data security, and threat awareness.
* Ability to diagnose common technical issues in M365 apps, endpoints, and connectivity.
* Find & resolve issues in Azure environments
* Willingness to learn and embrace evolving technologies and updates within the M365 environment and Azure ecosystem.


**Education and Certifications:**
* A degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field is a plus
* Certifications such as MD-102 Endpoint Administrator, AZ-104 Azure administrator, SC-900 Microsoft Security Fundamentals, or CompTIA Security+ is of merit.


**To succeed at Prog-It, you are:**
* Driven and committed - You can have direct dialogue with our customers and guide them through the technical landscape on your own.
* Solution-oriented and understands system architecture at a high level.
* Communicative and possesses good teamwork skills.
* Furthermore, a driver's license is required.


 This postition requires you to daily, speak fluently, read and write in Swedish.
   

  

 Furthermore, a driver's license -B is required.
   

  

**Our offer:**
* A pleasant work environment with an office conveniently located with good transportation options in Solna.
* Varied and versatile work.
* Interesting clients.
* You get to work with and in international teams.
* Collective agreement, and bonus system.
* Wellness allowance and occupational pension.

title: IT Architect (Moder Work, Security&Compliance, Azure and PowerPlatform)
description:
START
   

  

 2024-11-15
   

  

 November 15, 2024 – December 15, 2024
   

  

 During this period, the current IT architect will be available for handover.
   

  

 From December 15, the consultant is expected to work independently.
   

  

 SLUT
   

  

 2025-02-14 med option på förlängning
   

  

 STAD / REMOTE
   

  

 Linköping (kan eventuellt vara ok med någon dag remote per vecka)
   

  

 OMFATTNING
   

  

 100%
   

  

 UPPDRAGSBESKRIVNING
   

  

 Competence Area/Scope IT Architect should be quite technical and understands infrastructure (not too much of a "business architect"), with experience in a level 4.
   

  

 Work activities are tied to prioritizations at any given time. The person will need to be able to handle and coordinate in wide range of areas. Person who currently holds the role works closely with the 'Digital Workplace' project, and will hand over those activities and information to the consultant replacing her and then to pass on to the newly hired person later.
   

  

 KOMPETENSKRAV
   

  

 The consultant should have knowledge in at least following Microsoft technologies M365 (Moder Work, Security&Compliance), Azure and PowerPlatform.
   

  

* The most important thing is that you are quite technical and understand infrastructure (not too much of a "business architect")
* A specific task: Receive and store all the information in the current project "Digital Workplace" from the IT architect that will end so that the information can be forwarded to the new employee later.
* However, architecture issues other than "Digital workplace" can be prioritised. It is therefore important that the consultant is quite technical and can orchestrate different IT projects between functions and suppliers

title: Turnpikes söker IT-profiler!
description:
Är du passionerad inom IT och söker nya utmaningar? Turnpikes erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du kan växa och utvecklas tillsammans med ett team av engagerade kollegor. Välkommen till ett företag i framkant av teknik och innovation!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Turnpikes Sweden
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Turnpikes är en talangfull grupp människor med huvudkontor i Danmark men verksamma över hela världen, som möjliggör digital transformation för företagskunder. Turnpikes värdesätter sina starka relationer, strävar alltid efter att skapa värde och är stolta över sin extremt höga kundnöjdhet från några av världens största företag.
 


  


 Med en ständigt växande kundbas har behovet av ytterligare expansion blivit tydligt. Nu söker vi utvecklare som i en bred roll kommer få ta stort ansvar gentemot den svenska kundbasen. Du kommer att arbeta med tekniska uppgifter relaterade till OpenText Extended ECM (Enterprise Content Management) och leverera kvalitativa konfigurationer till projektteamet som definierar omfattningen och interagerar med slutkunden.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En fot in på ett företag vars tillväxtstrategi är ambitiös och där du får utrymme att växa i karriären
  
* Tydliga utvecklingsplaner och en platt struktur som ger dig tillgång till en stor kunskapsbas
  
* Möjlighet att arbeta med banbrytande teknologi och branschledande lösningar
  
* Omfattande förmånspaket
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Arbeta med definierade uppgifter i OpenText Extended ECM, som Web Reports, arbetsflöden, arkivhantering, etc.
  
* Leverera hög kvalitet i konfigurationer, utvecklingar och relaterad dokumentation.
  
* Samarbeta i ett större projektteam och kommunicera med dina kollegor på olika platser i världen.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en relevant universitetsutbildning inom IT
  
* Har en god generell teknisk förståelse
  
* Har erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling
  
* Har grundläggande erfarenhet av databashantering
  
* Kan kommunicera väl på både svenska och engelska
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Stresstolerant
  
* Målmedveten
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Intellektuellt nyfiken
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Turnpikes Sweden**

 Här kan du läsa mer om Turnpikes.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Turnpikes Sweden**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Mikaela Hofstedt eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107628

title: SAP Consultant
description:
**Skillset** 




 SAP CPI Senior Consultant
 



  





**Competencies** 




 Digital : SAP Cloud Platform Integration (CPI)
 



  





**Location** 




 Sweden-Stockholm
 



  





**Experience Range** 




 6 years & Above
 



  





**Daily Salary Rate:** 




 As per market rate
 



  





**Non English Language Dependency** 




 English
 



  





**Remote Working Yes/No** 




 No
 



  





**Contract duration** 




 6 Months + Extendable
 



  





**Job description:** 




 SAP CPI Senior Consultant. Identify, analyze, and develop interfaces and integration flows using SAP BTP Integration Suite/CPI-DS including Open Connectors and API management.
 



 \* Explain complex technical issues to project managers, developers, team leads and business analyst in an easy-to-understand manner and recommend clearly thought out solutions.

 \* Should have Knowledge of SAP PO to CPI migration
 



 \* Troubleshoot issues and provide bug fixes.

title: Presales Solutions Consultant
description:
**This is Mevisio**
 Mevisio is a growing start-up, offering a low-code platform that digitizes management and collaboration in the manufacturing industry. We have been around since 2017 and today, we have a fantastic portfolio of well known enterprise manufacturing companies globally!
   

  

 We provide a digital alternative to the physical whiteboards traditionally used for daily team meetings on the shop floor, with applications extending to general operations management and other Lean Manufacturing practices. The Mevisio Platform is a tool for leaders and team members to work smarter and more efficiently through visualization, improved communication and real time data.
   

  

 We are digitizing the manufacturing industry all over the world - want to join us
 *?*
**Why Mevisio?**
 We have an inclusive and friendly driven culture! Our values are central in our daily work:
 *Customer First, Better Together, People* 
 Matters and
 *Aim High!* 
 We have high ambitions but we know how important cross-collaboration and teamwork is in order to succeed. Every voice is important and we need motivated people onboard to do this - we need YOU!
   

  

 With our platform, supporting the daily operations in big manufacturing industries internationally, we have the possibility to make an impact in the world. We are not done yet, we have a lot more to achieve - let's do that together!
   

  

**What will you do?**
 If you find yourself in the middle of technique and business, with a passion for digitizing the manufacturing industry, we are now looking for a passionate and driven
 **Presales Solutions Consultant** 
 to join our commercial team.
   

  

 You'll act as a domain expert for our customers by applying your technical, industrial and business expertise. As a Presales Solutions Consultant at Mevisio, you and our sales people, will work closely together and act as the trusted advisor. You will ensure smooth sales cycles and help customers succeed by identifying their business needs and translating them into real-life solutions using our low-code platform, and guide them to reach operational excellence.
   

  

 Except from this, you will also play an important role to provide feedback to our product development by providing feedback to our Product and Engineering team. The position includes travels.
   

  

**Tasks In Your Daily Work**
* Build strong and engaging relationships with our customers through passion for technique and business.
* Collaborate with our sales team to understand customer needs and design customized solutions, with new and existing customers.
* Lead engaging product demonstrations, showcasing Mevisio’s platform and capabilities.
* Solve issues or technical problems to help our customers reach operational excellence.
* Partner with customers to translate their requirements into successful implementations.
* Deliver captivating presentations to new and existing customers, highlighting values and advantage of our platform.
* Configuring our platform using JavaScript and JSON.
* Become a trusted advisor, providing insights and recommendations to maximize value and customer success.
* Gather customer feedback to inform future product innovations.


**What We Think You Will Bring To Us**
* 3-5 years of experience in Presales or Technical consulting.
* Experience from manufacturing industry.
* Proven experience leading technical initiatives within complex organizations.
* The experience of managing diverse stakeholders across various levels.
* A passion for technology and innovation, with a knack for problem-solving.
* Strong communication skills.
* The ability to convey complex technical concepts in a simple way.
* Technical skills within JavaScript (JSON is a plus).
* A customer-centric mindset, ready to put our Customer First value into action.
* A positive and go-get them attitude!
* Team-oriented approach!
* An ambassador for our value Aim High!
* Fluent in English (German is a plus).


**Other Perks And Benefits**
 🚆 Near public transit
   

  

 🏖️ Paid Holiday
   

  

 📈 Pension plan
   

  

 🪐 Development opportunities
   

  

 🔕 Flexible working hours
   

  

 👨‍👩‍👧 Work-life balance (we use a hybrid work set up)
   

  

 👟 Gym around the corner
   

  

 🎊 Social gatherings
   

  

 🏢 Central Office
   

  

 🧑🏾‍💻 New tech gear
   

  

 ☕️ Free Coffee/Tee
   

  

 🥂 Free Thursday bubbles
   

  

**We hope you feel excited about the position and we would love to get to know you more!**
 Every year, Deloitte ranks Sweden's fifty fastest growing technology companies, in their Sweden Technology Fast 50 list. With a revenue growth of 914% over the last four years, 2018-2021, Mevisio made it to number 34 on the list. Adding to the achievement, the growth has been made with no external funding.
   

  

 – We are glad to see that our hard work has payed off. We are a small, dedicated team that is committed to providing an enterprise grade platform to our customers with the best user experience there is. Our customers have tough requirements when it comes to service delivery and information security—every new customer is an achievement. I'm really proud of the team that has made this possible, says Marcus Wejderot, CEO of Mevisio.

title: Inköpare inom IT till välkänt bolag!
description:
Har du erfarenhet av inköp och vill arbeta hos ett ledande företag i Stockholm? Ta nu chansen att stärka våran kunds Procurement Operations-team. Tjänsten är med start omgående - välkommen men din ansökan redan idag!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Centrala Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Ekonomi/juridik/inköp
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, vardagar mellan 08-17
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vår kund är ett välkänt bolag inom drivmedelsbranschen med huvudkontor i centrala Stockholm. De söker nu en resurs till avdelningen Procurement Operations, som hanterar inköp av indirekt material för hela bolaget.. Avdelningen består av cirka 20 medarbetare uppdelade på två grupper där personalen är placerad i tre städer.
 


  


 Avdelningen behöver nu en tillfällig resurs under tiden som rekrytering pågår. Start för tjänsten är snarast och slutdatum är ca 2025-06-30. Du kommer vara en del av inköpsavdelningen och hantera inköp inom kategorin IT, både mjukvara, system och hårdvara.
   




**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Upphandling och inköp av varor och tjänster utifrån koncernens fastställda processer och rutiner samt löpande arbete med att förbättra dessa.
  
* I samråd med verksamhetens beslutsfattare utveckla leverantörsstrategier, söka och utvärdera nya leverantörer, förhandla ramavtal samt utveckla en effektiv leverantörsdatabas
  
* Att säkerställa att all upphandling sker på det mest lönsamma och hållbara sättet
  
* Mäta och följa upp mätetal för kategorin, samt prioritera uppgifter så att de möter övergripande uppsatta mål
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en högskoleutbildning inom ekonomi, juridik eller teknik eller annan kompetens/erfarenhet som uppväger det
  
* Arbetat med inköp
  
* Goda kunskaper i MS Office
  
* Tala och skriva svenska och engelska obehindrat
  
* Vana att arbeta med många parallella informationsflöden
  


  


  

**Meriterande erfarenhet:**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av inköpsarbete inom IT området
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Strukturerad
  
* Noggrann
  
* Detaljorienterad
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Molly Rytter eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv5@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15107782

title: Business Analyst
job_function: Information Technology, Consulting, and Business Development
description:
*Vi söker dig som är en strategisk tänkare som kan har förmågan att se helheten i komplexa projekt. Som konsult hos Zington kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att förstå våra kunders affärsbehov och översätta dessa genomförbara krav. Brinner du för att hålla i workshops, sätta dig in i användarens behov och har ett stort teknikintresse tycker vi att du ska bli en av oss.* 




  





**Om tjänsten som Kravanalytiker/Business Analyst** 




 Vi söker en erfaren Business Analyst och Kravanalytiker som kombinerar teknisk insikt och användarbehov med affärsmässig förståelse. Du är ansvarsfull, drivande och strukturerad och är skicklig på att driva projekt framåt, bygga relationer och samarbeta med interna och externa parter.
 



  





 Du har erfarenhet av att samla in, analysera och validera krav från intressenter och har tidigare kunskap också kunskaper i hur du definierar och samt dokumenterar affärsprocesser och affärsflöden. Det är en stor fördel om du har erfarenhet av agila metoder, projektledning och att genomföra workshops. Som konsult är det extra viktigt att du tycker om att arbeta både i team men även självständigt samt är van vid att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där prioriteringar kan förändras snabbt.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som har** 



* Minst 5 års erfarenhet från liknande roll
* Relevant utbildning
* Starka analytiska färdigheter och förmåga att förstå, förenkla och kommunicera komplexa affärsprocesser och systemkrav
* Erfarenhet av att använda verktyg för kravhantering och dokumentation
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta egna initiativ för att driva projekt framåt
* Stark kommunikationsförmåga både i Svenska och Engelska
* Erfarenhet från bank eller försäkring ser vi som extra meriterande



  





**Som person tror vi du är** 



* Ansvarsfull och strukturerad med god kommunikationsförmåga
* Trivs och har vana av att jobba i en dynamisk miljö
* God teknisk och affärsmässig förståelse



  





**Mer om rollen** 




 Vi rekryterar löpande och ser gärna att du kan börja så snart som möjligt men månar om att hitta rätt person. Därför värderar vi dina personliga egenskaper och att vi trivs i hop högt.
 



  





 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta rekryterande chef Linda Wohlfeil på linda.wohlfeil@zingtongroup.com
 



  





**Om Zington** 




 Zington är ett konsultföretag med expertis inom Management, IT och Design. Vår resa började redan 2008 men idag är vi 250 medarbetare i Stockholm och fler än 4000 kollegor globalt inom VASS koncernen. Vi stöttar kunder som ex. Atrium Ljungberg, Axfood, Apollo och Fora i digital transformation genom att skapa tjänster, bygga lösningar och utforma strategier som driver affären framåt. På Zington ligger vår styrka i våra medarbetare. Oavsett om du är en specialist eller generalist kan vi som konsultföretag erbjuda dig en plats att växa och trivas på. Vi strävar efter att vara en plats där vi stöttar varandra, delar med oss av vår kunskap och utvecklas tillsammans. Vår framgång bygger på engagerade människor – när du växer, växer företag.

title: Corporate Legal Counsel
description:
Sinch is a Customer Communication Cloud company, directly powering meaningful conversations at scale across messaging, voice and email to help businesses deliver unified, personalized experiences that truly revolve around their customers - no matter the channels they use. More than 150,000 businesses - including many of the world's largest tech companies, rely on us for their customer communication needs.
   

  

 We dream big - for our company, our customers and our employees - and we hire the best talent worldwide to help us bring our vision to life. We have near 4,500 Sinchers in more than 60 countries - probably somewhere near you!
   

  

 We are seeking an experienced corporate and commercial lawyer to join our dynamic legal team based in Stockholm. In this role, you will navigate an exciting landscape of corporate, commercial, and legal challenges at the group level while becoming part of a diverse global community that interacts with various cultures.
   

  

****The essence of the role****
 As the Corporate Legal Counsel, you will report to and work closely with our Head of Legal Corporate and Legal Operations.
   

  

**As Our New Legal Counsel, You Will**
* Play a pivotal role in supporting the organization with corporate and commercial matters, while collaborating with colleagues from different cultural backgrounds across our international offices.
* Enhance our processes and frameworks, navigating complex legal issues related to procurement and technology, all while fostering a spirit of teamwork and collaboration.
* Be expected to draft, review, and manage various legal documents, with your ability to drive internal projects and negotiate commercial contracts being essential.
* Collaborate with other internal and external experts within Group Legal, as well as interacting with management and staff at all levels globally, thereby enriching your professional network and experience.


****Who are you?****
 To thrive in this role, you will bring a robust foundation in legal expertise alongside keen commercial insight. With a positive attitude, adaptability, and exceptional analytical skills, you are a motivated problem solver who excels in a supportive team environment. While you will enjoy autonomy where possible, we are committed to providing the assistance and collaboration you need to succeed.
   

  

 You have a knack for translating complex information into clear, accessible language. You are detail-oriented and business-focused, ready to engage with diverse perspectives in a dynamic international setting as a vital member of our global legal team.
   

  

**In order to be successful in this role, we believe you have:**
* A master's degree in law from a Swedish university.
* At least 3-5 years of qualified work experience, preferably from a well-renowned law firm or as an in-house legal counsel in a tech or similarly fast-paced industry.
* Strong experience in commercial law, including drafting and negotiating commercial agreements.
* Solid experience in corporate law, including long-term incentive programs.
* Experience working in a complex global organization is an advantage.
* Familiarity with the telecommunications or IT industry is desirable.
* Fluency in Swedish and English is required.


 Our corporate language is English,
 **please submit your application in English.**
 Are you ready? Join us on our journey!
   

  

**About The Recruitment Process**
 To help us place the right people in the right role, we believe in science-based and fair assessment methods. We follow a competence-based, structured interview process where your skills, experience, and attributes relevant to the role and Sinch will be assessed. As part of our recruitment process, pre-employment testing is used to help us increase our hiring success by identifying the candidates that are most likely to thrive and be successful in the role. We acknowledge that there are two parties deciding in this process and welcome you to ask any questions you may have at any stage of the process.

title: AWS Cloud Solutions Architect
description:
**️** 
**About Redeploy Build**
 At Redeploy Build, we are cloud specialists. What we do is build and integrate best-in-breed cloud environments, steering clear of legacy constraints and “old-IT”.
   

  

 We help our clients within all areas of public cloud - from building, governing, migrating and optimizing our client’s cloud resources. Living by a “Cloud always, in all ways” motto, we always get things done and are not just another powerpoint-firm, rather getting our hands dirty and putting tech into practice. Learn more about us here.
   

  

 As a rapidly growing public cloud company, we understand that our success depends on the talents we choose to surround ourselves with. Now we are looking for an AWS Cloud Solutions Architect in Stockholm, Gothenburg or Jönköping who wants to be a part of our continued success story. Maybe it's you?
   

  

**What it means to work as a AWS Cloud Solutions Architect Consultant at Redeploy**
 As an AWS Cloud Solution Architect, you will be a crucial member of the team and hold a multifaceted role, assuming the responsibility of owning client relationships right from the project's inception to the finish line.
   

  

 From the initial dialogues with clients to project kick-off, this role demands a seasoned professional who can seamlessly transition from talking to product owners/management and take ownership of the design, architecture, and driving the technical delivery alongside the client and our skilled team. Your responsibilities will include following areas:
   

  

* Client Relationship Ownership: Establish and nurture relationships with clients, initiating crucial dialogues at the project's outset to gain a comprehensive understanding of their objectives and expectations.
* Design and Architecture Ownership: Take charge of the conceptualization and design phase, translating client requirements into robust and innovative Azure solutions.
* Technical Delivery Leadership: Drive the technical delivery process, collaborating closely with the team to ensure the seamless implementation of cloud solutions. Your expertise will be instrumental in achieving project milestones and exceeding client expectations. We also expect you to be hands on and code, deploy and document when needed.


**Who are you?**
 We believe that you have a passion for cloud architecture and that you enjoy creating value and solving problems for clients and businesses. You’re a natural leader and open-minded, positive, driven and a curious person who understands the power of team collaboration and sharing knowledge with others.
   

  

**What experiences do you bring?**
* Experience in leading complex large-scale projects, particularly with enterprise customers or large organizations.
* A solid understanding of business operations and dynamics, allowing you to align technical solutions with overarching business objectives.
* Advanced knowledge and hands-on experience with AWS is essential, with additional public clouds such as Azure and GCP considered advantageous.
* A strong background in development, engineering or technical roles including hands-on experience with conceptualizing, strategizing, designing and architecting cloud solutions.
* Knowledge and practical experience of programming and Dev(Sec)Ops and Platform Engineering.
* Sharing, coaching and mentoring your fellow colleagues and clients.
* Hands-on experience with IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) with CloudFormation, CDK and/or terraform for example, version control systems (e.g., Git), and CI/CD pipelines.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.


**And** 
**if you come with following experiences, you will stick out from the crowd!**
* Well-Architected Framework, Landing Zones and Cloud Governance
* Container management and microservices such as Kubernetes, Docker and Openshift.
* Data and Analytics such as Databricks and Snowflake
* Developer Experience, Cloud Optimization, Machine Learning and FinOps framework.


*Even if you don’t perfectly match the role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe in diversity and inclusion and welcome all applicants with relevant experience and skills.*
 🤝
 **What we offer**
 Being a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. We enjoy creative freedom with our projects, benefit from great work/life balance, and thrive in a company culture that is both collaborative and supportive. Everything we do at Redeploy is centered around the simple yet effective idea that we all chip in to ensure our success.
   

  

**To Learn More About Our Benefits, Scroll Down 👇🏼**
 📍
 **Location**
 We have offices located in central Stockholm, Göteborg and Jönköping. As we encourage a mix of in-person and remote work to foster innovation and support work-life balance (and like to have fun together), we see that you are based in commuting distance to our office location.
   

  

 📩
 **How to apply**
 We hope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Redeploy.
   

  

 We are constantly recruiting, so submit your application as soon as you can by hitting the apply button. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel. Please submit your application using the form on our career website, or any website displaying a position with us.
   

  

 For any specific questions about the position, reach out to Talent Acquisition Manager Francisca Andersson.
   

  

 We look forward hearing from you!

title: Interns to Strategy & Consulting Spring Internship
description:
Are you interested in a career as a consultant? Then our spring internship at Accenture Strategy & Consulting is a perfect find. Bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career!
   

  

**About Strategy & Consulting**
 Through deep industry expertise, analytics and insights, we empower clients to survive and thrive in the new, the now and the unknown. Accenture Strategy & Consulting enables leaders to act quickly and confidently as they pivot to the future. Known for our ability to execute at speed, we help clients determine clear, actionable paths to competitive agility by bringing them new thinking on business and technology. Strategy & Consulting practitioners specialize within functional business areas, such as Finance, HR, Supply Chain and Technology, and industries including e.g., Retail, Consumer Goods & Services, Financial Services, Comms & Media, Utilities, Automotive & Health.
   

  

 Within Strategy & Consulting, we offer three talent segments:
   

  

  

- Strategy combines deep industry and functional expertise, data driven insight and human-centered approaches to help our clients shape their business strategies, optimize cost and drive growth

- Industry and Functional Consulting leverage industry and functional expertise and data-driven insights to advise, design and implement transformational solutions to reimagine business functions and create new business models for our clients

- Data & AI works to unlock the power of automation, analytics and AI, and pave the way for innovation.

**Strategy Intern**
 As a Strategy Intern at Accenture, you could:
   

  

  

- Develop value-driven strategies to reach concrete business results in collaboration with senior executives

- Design the strategic technology and IT agenda for the next 3-5 years that maximizes business value for the client

- Explore how new innovative digital technologies can help solve the clients’ key business challenges

**Industry and Functional Consulting Intern**
 As a Consulting Intern at Accenture, you could:
   

  

  

- Apply insights and knowledge to help clients navigate in a changing business environment, optimize their business and leverage their talent

- Help clients identify and unlock value in their business using benchmarks, interviews and workshops

- Design and implement business processes to transform our clients’ business

- Define how the client will evolve to the future state— i.e. the impact of the changes and the steps we will take to help the leaders, employees, customers and others adapt quickly to new ways of working.

**Data & AI Intern**
 As a Data & AI Intern at Accenture, you could:
   

  

  

- Develop innovative solutions for and with clients with a focus on Data, Data Visualization, Analytics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

- Design and implement tools and methods to efficiently retrieve, manage, communicate and visualize large amounts of data

- Analyze, design and deliver next-generation digital architecture to meet changing business needs

- Educate clients and users in methods, market trends, tools and functionality linked to Analytics, AI and Machine Learning

**What’s in it for you:**
- Great development opportunities to start building your professional career

- Great opportunity to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization - including methodology, knowledge databases, expert networks and benchmarks

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your internship with continuous feedback

- Inspiring colleagues to support you during the internship and a lot of fun activities

- A perfect way of testing out the life of being a consultant

**Who we are looking for:**
- You are a student and after finished internship, you will have approximately one year left of your studies for a master's degree

- You have proven strong academic results

- You are an analytical problem-solver with strong business acumen

- You are ambitious, driven, solution-oriented and eager to start your career in an advisory role

- You have excellent written and oral presentation skills in English and Swedish

- You will be located in Stockholm, Sweden during the internship

- Within Data & AI, data literacy is central - we want you to feel comfortable handling and analysing data as well as being curious about its capabilities

**Duration** 
 : Our internship runs from 21-April 2025 for 8 weeks, until 13-June 2025.
   

  

**Office** 
 : We are looking for interns to join our office in Stockholm.
   

  

**The application** 
 : Attach
 **CV, Cover Letter, and GPA transcript** 
 . Please note that all these documents are required for a complete application. Only complete applications are reviewed.
 *Specify clearly at the top of your Cover Letter which Talent Segment (Strategy and/or Consulting and/or Data & AI) you are interested in* 
 . The screening and selection process is done continuously, so send in your application today! We need your application no later than
 **December1st** 
 .
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**About Accenture**
 Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services and solutions in strategy, consulting, digital, technology and operations. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries and all business functions — underpinned by the world’s largest delivery network — Accenture works at the intersection of business and technology to help clients improve their performance and create sustainable value for their stakeholders. With more than 710,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture drives innovation to improve the way the world works and lives. Visit us at www.accenture.com
   

  

 Equal is greater than - Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from a diverse group of backgrounds related to gender, age, ethnicity, culture, race, religion and belief, disability, nationality, sexual orientation and gender identity. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values, providing an environment where everyone brings distinct experience, talent and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity!

title: Testautomatiserare
job_function: Quality Assurance, Information Technology, and Consulting
description:
*Är du en fena på automatisering och att hjälpa ditt team att leverera funktionalitet med högsta kvalitet? Vi söker nu dig som vill göra skillnad hos våra kunder, samtidigt som du blir en del av ett härligt gäng likasinnade kollegor som delar kunskap med varandra och växer tillsammans.* 




  





**Om rollen** 




 Som testautomatiserare på Zington är du en nyckelspelare i att säkerställa högsta kvalitet och pålitlighet i våra kunders produkter och lösningar. Du implementerar ramverk för testautomatisering och jobbar med automatisering i befintliga ramverk, antingen tillsammans med utvecklarna i Scrum-team eller i end-to-end-team.
 



  





 För att lyckas i denna roll tror vi att du är en engagerad och initiativtagande person som ständigt vill utvecklas och gärna delar med dig av dina kunskaper och erfarenheter till andra. Du har förmågan att snabbt sätta dig in i komplexa problem och drivs av att hitta hållbara lösningar på dessa.
 



  





 Vi är övertygade om att vår framgång är ett resultat av kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, spännande uppdrag och framför allt att vi tar oss tid att dela skratt och skapa minnesvärda stunder tillsammans. Låter det som något för dig? Då vill vi lära känna dig bättre!
 



  





**Dina kompetenser och egenskaper** 




  




* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom relevant område.
* Minst 7 års praktisk arbetslivserfarenhet inom testautomatisering och/eller teknisk test.
* Kompetens inom ett programmeringsspråk såsom Java, C#, JavaScript eller Python.
* Gärna erfarenhet av databaser samt verktyg såsom Selenium, ReadyAPI/SoapUI/Postman, PlayWright eller Cypress.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
* Erfarenhet av DevOps är meriterande.



  





**Mer om rollen** 




 Vi rekryterar löpande och ser gärna att du kan börja så snart som möjligt men månar om att hitta rätt person. Därför värderar vi dina personliga egenskaper och att vi trivs ihop högt.
 



  





 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta rekryterande chef Anders Eng på anders.eng@zingtongroup.com, tel: 070-582 18 70.
 



  





**Om Zington** 




 Zington är ett konsultföretag med expertis inom Management, IT och Design. Vår resa började redan 2008 men idag är vi 250 medarbetare i Stockholm och fler än 4000 kollegor globalt inom VASS koncernen. Vi stöttar kunder som ex. Atrium Ljungberg, Axfood, Apollo och Fora i digital transformation genom att skapa tjänster, bygga lösningar och utforma strategier som driver affären framåt. På Zington ligger vår styrka i våra medarbetare. Oavsett om du är en specialist eller generalist kan vi som konsultföretag erbjuda dig en plats att växa och trivas på. Vi strävar efter att vara en plats där vi stöttar varandra, delar med oss av vår kunskap och utvecklas tillsammans. Vår framgång bygger på engagerade människor – när du växer, växer företag.

title: Assignment leader for research projects to Mycronic!
description:
Think of the most high-tech electronics products you can imagine. Then think one step further. What technology creates the most advanced high-tech of today? Mycronic´s do. With unique and world-leading production solutions, they spearhead the electronics industry. Right now, Mycronic are on a journey of growth, where they continue to explore new markets and expand worldwide. Are you an experienced engineer with deep technical understanding and interest in project management? Then this role is for you!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Mycronic AB (publ)
 



  

**City :**
 Täby
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Technology
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 According to agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Recruitment
   




**About the role**

 Mycronic is a Swedish high-tech company and has been a trusted partner to electronics and display manufacturers worldwide for over 50 years. They are headquartered in Stockholm, Täby and with subsidiaries, agents and distributors in more than 50 countries. From the very beginning, when Mycronic introduced the world’s first laser-based mask writer, their innovations have been driven by two main sources, their customers and their employees. Currently, there is no other company in the entire world that can compete with Mycronic's technology. All high-resolution screens you see, whether it's a TV, phone, tablet, Apple Watch, etc., they are made with Mycronic’s machines, and that´s the technology you will work with. As a Assignment leader you will belong to a team of three team members including you, one more Project Manager and your closest manager. In addition to your closest team, you will collaborate with a lot of different functions within Mycronic, such as R&D, sales, other project managers and operations and you will report to Anna Lidell Calner, Group Manager System Design, Verification & Technology Center.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* A role where you work in the absolute forefront of Mycronic's tech development! You will work with identifying future development projects, exploring new technology areas, defining project scopes and ensure that the right development projects are started and delivered on time.
  
* To be part of a company with a diverse culture and workforce. To Mycronic, diversity is not only a key competitive advantage, but also the very foundation for a great place to work and innovation to happen.
  
* Not only nice colleagues but also high levels of expertise - you will find yourself side by side with some of the leading experts in the electronics industry, getting inspired and inspiring others, as you acquire new knowledge and share it with others across functions and cultures.
  
* A company with great opportunities for professional growth and development
  


  


  

**Work tasks**



  


 You will work in parallel projects at a time, which usually lasts from a couple of months up to a year, depending on the scope of the project. An example can be to drive the work of evaluating early concepts in order to be able to make decisions about direction. Furthermore, you will…
 


  

  
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project scope, goals, and deliverables
  
* Develop and manage project plans and schedules
  
* Monitor project performance and implement necessary adjustments to ensure objectives are met
  
* Create the right prerequisites needed for the projects members to succeed
  
* Provide regular updates to stakeholders on project status, risks, budget and progress
  
* Drive improvements of work methods and tools within your area
  

  


**We are looking for**

 This is a role for you who have a deep technical background and experience or interest in project management. You likely appreciate the combination of working on both the overall vision and the finer details.
 


  


 On top of this, you have…
 


  

  
* At least a master’s degree, preferably within engineering physics or similar
  
* Deep and broad technical understanding and interest in complex technologies
  
* Experience from product development
  
* Strong knowledge in English, both oral and written
  


  


 Personal competencies:
 


  

  
* Solutions Oriented
  
* Goal Oriented
  
* Cooperative
  
* Intellectually curious and innovative
  
* Structured
  


  


  

**Information about the recruitment process**



  

  
* Phone interview with Academic Work
  
* Personality- and problem-solving test
  
* In depth interview with Academic Work
  
* Interviews with Mycronic
  
* Reference checking and decision
  


  


  

**Other information**



  

  
* Work area: R&D PG
  
* Location: Headquarters in Täby, Stockholm
  
* Extent: Fulltime, permanent employment
  
* Contact information: Senior Recruitment Consultant Johanna Sörell, Johanna.sorell@academicwork.se
  


  

  

  

  

  

**Get directly recruited to Mycronic AB (publ)**

 When you apply to this application, you will get hired by our partner. This means that you can relax while we take care of the application process.
   




**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Johanna Sörell or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv3@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107073

title: Technical Cyber Security Consultant
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Computer and Network Security, and Software Development
description:
WithSecure™ protects businesses all over the world from modern threats. We do this through a Co-security approach born from first-hand knowledge that no one can solve every cyber security problem alone. Every single day, our diverse, growing team fights against online extortion, threats to national infrastructure, the unlawful spread of sensitive information, and everything in-between. The best part about working for WithSecure is our people! We are a community of dedicated and passionate professionals that take workplace happiness seriously. If you’re looking for something that’s more than just a job – we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**Role**
 We have openings for mid-level and senior technical cyber security consultants in Sweden.
 **Your role will include penetration testing and security assessments.** 
 Assessment types are guided by your interests. Depending on your skill, aptitude and career goals, your role can include, but won’t be limited to:
   

  

* Application Security
* Cloud Security Assessments
* Mainframe Security Assessments
* Purple Teaming
* Red Team & Targeted Attack Simulations


 The ideal candidate will be keen to produce security research that push the industry forward, and contribute to WithSecure Labs (https://labs.withsecure.com/) . Each consultant is expected to continue their education. In particular CREST CCT (App/Inf) and Offensive Security certifications are valued. WithSecure will invest in your education and provide maximum support to ensure that your skills remain relevant throughout your career here.
   

  

**What we need?**
 An ideal candidate will have
 **3+ years' worth of experience in security consulting** 
 , as well as:
   

  

* relevant industry certifications OSCP/OSEP/OSCE or working towards CCT or relevant certifications
* a relevant degree (e.g. Computer Science)
* cloud experience is seen as a plus


**Skills**
 We solve complex cyber-security problems daily and to do so requires an interesting and comprehensive set of skills. To be successful at WithSecure and help our clients with their challenges you’ll need the following:
   

  

* Passion for security - WithSecure’ s consultations are passionate about what they do. They have a passion for computers, hackings, security and most importantly, solving problems. If this wasn’t your job, it would be your hobby. At WithSecure Consulting, we believe in technical excellence, its how we demonstrate our passion.
* Self-motivation - you’re not going to be told what to do all the time – we will support your progression, but it will be up to you. With an understanding what is important to the business and our client, you will be given opportunity to determine how your time is best spent. We are an output driven business, this is to say that your output is what is ultimately important, we don’t micromanage. You will be working with the industry’s top consultants. They are there to support you, provided that you demonstrate that you are doing your best.
* Communication skills - communication skills is as important as your technical abilities. The ability to write excellent reports will already be measured during your first 12 weeks at WithSecure. In addition to written communication skills, you are expected to have good verbal communication skills. You will have the ability to explain complex technical issues to a wide range of audiences which often include senior business stakeholders.
* Ability to thrive in high-pressure environments - consulting is hard work, and pressure is high. WithSecure has high standards and high expectations of consultants. We work with some of the biggest and most interesting businesses in the word. This inevitably results in often stressful but particularly exciting and rewarding work.


 We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace that values and respects all people, regardless of their background, identity, or experience. We believe that diversity and inclusion are essential for our success as a company and for our customers’ satisfaction. We encourage applications from people of all backgrounds, abilities, and perspectives.

title: 13.Säkerhetsbataljon söker IT-Säkerhetschef
description:
* Säkerhetsbataljon är ett operativt försvarsmaktsgemensamt krigsförband med hög materiel och personell tillgänglighet som ska kunna verka i hela konfliktskalan. Bataljonens huvuduppgift är att upptäcka, klarlägga och motverka säkerhetshotande verksamhet i form av främmande underrättelseinhämtning, kriminalitet, terrorism, sabotage och subversion som riktas mot Försvarsmaktens prioriterade skyddsvärden.


 Bataljonen verkar preventivt genom säkerhetsunderrättelsetjänst och säkerhetsskyddshöjande åtgärder.
   

  

 Vår vision är att 13.Säkerhetsbataljon bryter motståndarens förnekelsebarhet, och skapar förutsättningar för hela Försvarsmakten att möta varje hot och klara varje utmaning.
   

  

 Vill du vara med och bidra till att öka säkerheten på 13.Säkerhetsbataljon genom att arbeta med säkerhetsskyddshöjande åtgärder?
   

  

**Nu söker vi en IT-säkerhetschef till Underrättelse och Säkerhetssektionen, S2.**
 Underrättelse och säkerhetssektionen vid 13.Säkerhetsbataljon leder, samordnar och utvecklar bataljonens underrättelse och säkerhetstjänst. Som IT-säkerhetschef tillhör du säkerhetsdetaljen på sektionen. Säkerhetsdetaljen ansvarar för 13.Säkerhetsbataljons interna säkerhetstjänst och stödjer chefer vid planering och genomförande av insatser. Befattningen innebär stora möjligheter att utveckla kompetens och erfarenhet inom säkerhetstjänst.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 Som IT-säkerhetschef hos oss kommer du arbeta på 13. Säkerhetsbataljons stab. Här kommer du planera och följa upp informationssäkerheten och IT-säkerheten inom bataljonen. Genomföra utbildning inom informations- och IT-säkerhet. Utvärdera och motverka de risker som finns kopplade till bataljonens IT-system och följa upp ackreditering av system med mera. Som IT-säkerhetschef hos oss och en del av säkerhetsdetaljen kommer du att kunna utveckla dig själv inom säkerhetstjänsten såväl som att få möjlighet att utbilda andra i säkerhetstjänst.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* Erfarenhet från säkerhets- och/eller underrättelsetjänst
* Genomförd och godkänd specialistofficersutbildning
* B-körkort


**Meriterande**
* Genomförd internationell insats vid underrättelse/säkerhetsförband.
* Utbildning inom militär- och/eller civil säkerhetstjänst
* Tidigare tjänstgöring på militärpolis- eller säkerhetsförband
* Erfarenhet från internationell insats
* Säkerhetsutbildning via FMUNDSÄKC
* Genomförd ISUS utbildning
* God datorvana


**Dina egenskaper**
 Befattningen ställer krav på god samarbetsförmåga och social kompetens. Då arbetstempot ofta är högt förutsätter det att du har en hög stresstålighet och uthållighet. Arbetet innebär hantering av sekretessklassificerad information vilket ställer krav på att du är ansvarstagande och har hög personlig integritet. Du är initiativtagande och engagerad med god förmåga att självständigt planera och lösa uppgifter som kan sträcka sig över tid. Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Utbildningar**
 Inom försvarsmakten finns det mycket goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling. Detta gäller även inom området IT-säkerhet där det finns flera kurser som specifikt riktar sig mot IT-säkerhetschefer i försvarsmakten. Utbildningar tillhandahålls efter behov.
   

  

*För att myndighetens uppdrag ska vara framgångsrikt förutsätts att alla medarbetare uppträder enligt den värdegrund som finns. Försvarsmaktens värdegrund slår vakt om alla människors lika värde, rättsvisa och jämlikhet och främjar demokrati och mänskliga rättigheter (läs mer på* 
*www.forsvarsmakten.se* 
*).*
**Övrigt**
 Anställningsform:Tillsvidareanställning som inleds med 6 månaders provanställning
   

  

 Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid
   

  

 Arbetsort Kungsängen
   

  

 Tillträdesdatum: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Upplysningar om befattningen**
 LG-13sakbat-s2sak@mil.se
   

  

 Märk mailet ”Rekrytering IT-säkerhetschef S2-säk”.
   

  

**Information om rekryteringsprocessen:**
 Personalgeneralist Chris Flygare, LG-13sakbat-rekrytering@mil.se
   

  

**Fackliga företrädare**
 Kenneth Hartikainen OFR/S
   

  

 Orry Finnermark OFR/O
   

  

 Johan Gillemyr SACO
   

  

 Lise-Lott Larsson SEKO
   

  

 Samtliga nås via: 08-584 540 00
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan
 *senast* 
**2024-11-03** 
*.* 
 Din ansökan bör innehålla CV samt ansökningsbrev där du motiverar varför du är lämpad för denna befattning.
   

  

**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Livgardet är ett av Försvarsmaktens största förband med anor från 1521. Vi utbildar morgondagens soldater, liksom militärpoliser och personal som ska genomföra internationell insats. Vi bevakar de kungliga slotten, vi har säkerhets- och markstridsförband. Vi ansvarar också för att bevara och utveckla svensk militärmusiktradition. Vårt huvudsäte är i Kungsängen utanför Stockholm, men vi finns också i Sollentuna, i centrala Stockholm, Uppsala, Göteborg och Karlskrona. Inom Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård samt bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Operations Manager
description:
We think you’ll thrive in this role if you:
   

  

* Are an IB graduate or young professional passionate about education, able to relate to educators and quickly understand their challenges
* Love to build systems for scale - be that recruitment, CRM or designing an incredible learning experience
* Want every school to love their experience with us. You are obsessed with quality and foster relationships through community management of our teachers as well as building trusting relationships with the schools we serve


 We think you're someone with a background with school recruitment, operations & delivery or someone working in pedagogy delivery will thrive in this position.
   

  

 Lanterna is based in Stockholm, Sweden, but we are open to any European location with regular trips to Stockholm.
   

  

**About Lanterna Education**
 Lanterna is a dynamic, fast-growing online teaching company dedicated to unlocking every student's potential. We provide exceptional live online education to IB (International Baccalaureate) students worldwide, delivered by a network of top IB graduates and outstanding IB teachers. Together with our sister company Kognity, we are on a mission to radically improve learning for the world's students. Our environment is vibrant, caring, and creatively charged.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Lanterna’s Schools team solves the teacher crisis for a global network of schools, providing short and long-term online teaching coverage. Although Lanterna has been around for almost 20 years, providing unrivalled tutoring and prep courses for students, the B2B arm of our business is still nascent but growing extremely fast. In our first full year of operations, we have grown rapidly, now serving over 100 IB schools around the world.
   

  

 You will be on a team of 2 managing the entire operations and delivery lifecycle for the schools we support. This includes recruitment and onboarding, community management, lesson quality assurance, communications with all stakeholders (teachers, school leaders, IB professionals), and more. You will work closely with our Global Account Manager to ensure seamless and positive customer experience throughout each delivery.
   

  

 We're not just looking for a team member – we're looking for a future leader. Over the next 2 to 3 years, you may have the opportunity to build and lead your own team under your expert guidance.
   

  

**About You**
* A recent university graduate (0-5 years) or junior teacher with an IB background
* Boundless and infectious enthusiasm for international education
* A ‘can do’ attitude
* A extremely strong bias to action
* Extremely tech-savvy, with CRM experience a bonus
* Inspire trust in customers and partners through tonality and dialogue
* A team player who celebrates overall success more than their own


**Skills**
 Organisational skills: You will be the engine room and the beating heart of our business unit. A pragmatic problem solver will thrive in this position.
   

  

 Calm under pressure: Any given day can throw up lots of exciting challenges, and as we work across global timezones, we need to be prepared to deal with last minute challenges.
   

  

 Communication: You will deal with stakeholders at all levels, across multiple countries. Positive, calm, engaging communications will help our teaching community, and the schools we support, love what we do.
   

  

**Our Culture**
 We pride ourselves on our diversity, openness, flat hierarchy, transparency, authenticity, entrepreneurial spirit, and team orientation. We seek ambitious individuals who are not only eager to make a meaningful impact but are also committed to continuous self-improvement and to enhancing the capabilities of their colleagues.
   

  

**Interview process**
 Intro Call with Team Lead: Have an informal 10 minute chat with Tim to learn more about the role and ensure it is a cultural match.
   

  

 Hiring Manager Hangout: Connect with Tim & Anna (Operations manager) for a more in-depth conversation. Uncover the nitty-gritty details of the role and get to know each other.
   

  

 Meet the wider team: Online meet and greet with the rest of the schools team
   

  

 Case study: Solve a real schools marketing challenge and present your case to the team.
   

  

 We are looking for someone who can join our team soon. We hope that's you!

title: Implementation Manager
description:
**Job Description**
*With an increasing demand for IT infrastructure, our global company is in a sector with rapid growth, and we are now looking for an Implementation Manager to join our team. If you are eager to work on multiple projects in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, then we look forward to hearing from you.*
**Your role**
 This role offers you the opportunity to showcase your project management expertise and technical skills. As an Implementation Manager, you will assist and provide technical oversight and guidance through your project management and task tracking activities. Working cross-functionally with other teams, you will coordinate the deployment and installation of equipment and infrastructure within a data center environment. It will be your mission to ensure these deployments are completed on time, on budget and error-free.
   

  

 You will be part of a 4-person Nordic team and support our 10 data centers, but primarily the Swedish sites. We work together on a daily basis and support each other with highs and lows.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 The Implementation Manager’s primary responsibility is project management of customer implementations. This typically includes the installation of racks, electrical distribution, cages, containment systems and data cable infrastructure. You will manage multiple simultaneous projects across several data centers using standard project and construction management best practices. Amongst others these will be your tasks:
   

  

* Effectively manage the execution of all assigned customer implementation projects, in accordance with the contractual agreements and implementation timelines.
* Complete end-to-end planning, coordinate of work and take responsibility for resource allocation, quality specs and timeline.
* Coordinate delivery of multiple installations and keep a complete record of process and results.
* Be responsible for and manage customer’s acceptance after completion.
* Assist with coordination of on-site deliveries.
* Submit vendor access requests and ensure vendor’s access is validates in time to keep work on schedule.


**What You’ll Need**
 To be a good fit for this opportunity you’ll need:
   

  

* +3 years of experience from technical work in a data center or company from a similar industry.
* A college degree, preferably technical with know-how of electricity.
* Advance level knowledge of rack, cage, electrical distribution and data cable infrastructure.
* A record of showcasing great customer service skills.
* A detail oriented approach and strong multi-tasking abilities.
* To be a self-starter, proactive, flexible and able to work within and meet deadlines.
* The ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, mission critical facilities environment.


 Since we are an international company it´s necessary that you have excellent communication skills in Swedish and English, verbally and in writing.
   

  

**About Us**
 Digital Realty brings companies and data together by delivering the full spectrum of data center, colocation and interconnection solutions. PlatformDIGITAL®, the company’s global data center platform, provides customers with a secure data meeting place and a proven Pervasive Datacenter Architecture (PDx®) solution methodology for powering innovation and efficiently managing Data Gravity challenges. Digital Realty gives its customers access to the connected data communities that matter to them with a global data center footprint of 300+ facilities in 50+ metros across 25+ countries on six continents.
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
 Our rapidly evolving business sector offers the opportunity to be part of a courageous and passionate team who work together to understand and meet the changing needs of our global customers.
   

  

 Join us and you’ll be part of a supportive and inclusive environment where you can bring your whole self to work. As part of our team, you’ll get to work with people from different business areas, challenge the way we do things and put your ideas into action. We’ll also give you plenty of development opportunities so you can build a rewarding and successful career with us.
   

  

**Apply now**
 Interested in this role? We’re growing fast, so this is a great time to join us and make your mark on our future. The position is a permanent position with employment at Digital's office in Akalla, Stockholm.
   

  

 In this recruitment we are working together with Grafton, Gi Group Holding. Please note that they will also receive your application. Apply through the link.

title: Global Training Business Development Manager
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About Business Assurance**
 We help companies ensure compliance, build high-performing management systems, and meet competence needs within a wide range of industries. DNV helps companies understand Working with us, you can be involved in technically challenging and innovative projects worldwide demanding a broad variety of expertise. Our strong focus on research and innovation opens an array of opportunities, and allows you to engage in projects which develop next generation solutions. and manage their risk picture through our management system certification and training portfolios.
   

  

**About The Role**
**Global Training Business Development Manager**
**Location:** 
 Remote (Anywhere in Europe)
   

  

 Are you ready to take your passion for business development to a global level? As our Global Training Business Development Manager, you will be at the forefront of our growth strategy, directly influencing how we deliver training services across the world. You’ll lead both the strategic and innovative efforts to expand our impact, helping us shape a safer and more sustainable future.
   

  

 In this remote role, you’ll have the flexibility to work from anywhere in Europe, collaborating with teams from across the globe. Your vision and leadership will drive revenue, profitability, and the success of our training services. You will empower local teams, innovate new solutions, and inspire others to achieve their best.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead with impact: Develop and implement comprehensive global training strategies that will take our services to the next level.
* Innovate and inspire: Drive the creation of new training services and guide country teams in developing their own localized solutions.
* Be the catalyst for growth: Identify opportunities for business expansion, and work closely with sales and delivery teams to execute innovative business ideas.
* Collaborate globally: Work with country teams to develop action plans that drive growth, exceed sales targets, and maximize profitability.
* Lead and mentor: Build a high-performance culture by coaching and inspiring teams to succeed and drive continuous improvement.
* Make a difference: Present compelling training service propositions to key customers, helping organizations around the world enhance their performance and sustainability.


 What we offer
   

  

 A career with DNV is different. We offer you the chance to combine your ambition with our purpose of safeguarding life, property and the environment. We are a trusted partner for many of the world’s most successful and forward-thinking companies who know we deliver high-quality work no matter how complex the problem.
   

  

 We do this by bringing together world-class experts empowered with the tools and resources they need to learn, innovate and produce industry-defining work. At DNV, you will feel proud of the work you and your team achieve – for our customers, for each other and in pursuit of our vision and purpose.
   

  

 DNV Business Assurance is one of the world’s leading certification bodies. Globally, our team consists of more than 2,000 employees in 140 countries. We offer a challenging and developing job with opportunities for both professional and personal development.
   

  

**Why DNV?**
 This is your opportunity to be part of something bigger. At DNV, you’ll not only advance your career but also contribute to a mission that matters. You’ll work with world-class experts, empowered to innovate, create, and shape the future. You’ll be proud of the work you do every day, knowing it’s making a real difference – for our customers, for our planet, and for a safer, more sustainable future.
   

  

 DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture, and we invite you to be part of this diversity!
   

  

**Ready to lead and inspire?**
 This is your moment. Apply today, and let’s shape the future of training together!
   

  

**About You**
 You’re a dynamic leader with a passion for business development and innovation. You thrive in a global environment and excel at building relationships across diverse markets and cultures. You have a growth mindset, and you’re always looking for new opportunities to make an impact.
   

  

**To Excel In This Role, You Will Bring**
* Bachelor's degree (master's degree preferred).
* At least 5 years of experience in a growth-focused role, ideally with a strong background in management system certification and training.
* Extensive knowledge and experience in training services and business development, enabling you to drive business performance effectively.
* Previous experience in a global role, showcasing your ability to navigate diverse markets and cultures.
* Strong commercial awareness and a record of delivering exceptional results.
* Willingness and ability to travel, as necessary, to support our global operations.
* Outstanding written and verbal English communication skills to engage with stakeholders across borders.
* A commitment to embodying DNV's leadership expectations, including results orientation, customer focus, respect, care, and foresight.
* A solution-oriented mindset, combined with a pragmatic approach to problem-solving.
* A passion for driving change and innovation wherever opportunities arise.


 If you're ready to make a significant impact on our training services and contribute to DNV’s mission of shaping a safer and more sustainable future, we want to hear from you. Apply today and let's redefine the future of training together!

title: Engineering Manager - Data Platform
description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive suite of multi-cloud and on-premise data solutions for the enterprise. We want to make it easy to operate any database on any cloud, or on premise. The data platform team covers the full range of data stores and data technologies, spanning from big data, NoSQL, cache-layer capabilities, and analytics; all the way to structured SQL engines like Postgres and MySQL. We aim to deliver fault-tolerant mission-critical distributed systems, and the world's best data platform.
   

  

 We are looking for technical Engineering Managers to lead teams focused on Big Data and MySQL databases. We write code in Python and encode modern operational practices for data applications at scale on Kubernetes and cloud machines.
   

  

**Location:** 
*This role can be filled in European, Middle East, African or any American region / time zone.*
 What your day will look like
   

  

* You will lead a team building scalable data solutions for Kubernetes and cloud machines
* You will hire, coach, mentor, provide feedback, and lead your team by example
* You will demonstrate sound engineering skill by directly contributing code when needed
* Effectively set and manage expectations with other engineering teams, senior management, and external stakeholders
* Advocate modern, agile software development practices
* Develop and evangelize great engineering and organizational practices
* Ensure that your team delivers excellent products that users love by maintaining a culture of quality and engineering excellence
* Grow a healthy, collaborative engineering culture aligned with the company's values.
* Be an active part of the leadership team and collaborate with other leaders in the organization
* Work from home with global travel twice yearly, for internal events of one or two weeks duration


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* A software engineering background, preferably with Python and Golang experience
* Experience running in production and at scale, preferably Big Data or MySQL
