Understanding of current and enterprise-wide technologies including Open Source, web application development and databases (DB/2, Oracle, SQL).
  
Experience in agile ways of working and knowledge about SAFe methodology.
  
Bachelor’s or master’s degree in a related field, or similar work experience.
  
Fluent in English, both written and spoken.

title: Data Scientist
description:
At Storytel we believe that powerful stories add an extra dimension to life. Storytel is one of the world’s leading audiobook and ebook streaming services that offers unlimited listening to consumers in 25+ markets. Our vision is to make the world a more empathetic place with great stories to be shared and enjoyed by anyone, anywhere, anytime. We are now looking for a Data Scientist to join our Machine Learning team.

**About the team**
------------------


Storytel is looking for a Data Scientist to join our Machine Learning team within the Data Science & Engineering domain. You will work on a diverse set of high-impact projects focused on customer engagement, automated content curation and personalized recommendations. As a key member of the team, you will contribute to designing and building models that enhance how our users interact with our platform, deepening their connection to stories from around the globe. Your insights will help shape our strategies to drive engagement and optimize user experiences.  

  



### **As a Data Scientist at Storytel, you will:**

* Join a **centralized Machine Learning team** within our larger Engineering organization, working on strategic initiatives to drive customer engagement and retention.
* Develop and optimize **end-to-end machine learning models** that will have a high impact on the end user and our decision making processes.
* Partner closely with the **Data Engineering and MLOps teams** to ensure smooth deployment, scalability and robustness of machine learning systems.
* Collaborate with **commercial stakeholders** to navigate complex requirements, design experiments, measure model performance, and shape data-driven strategies to enhance customer engagement.
* Leverage your machine learning expertise to contribute to the **advancement of Storytel’s technical ecosystem**, including new model development, MLOps frameworks and scalable data pipelines.
* Engage in **ML community meetings, journal clubs, and peer learning activities** to stay at the forefront of industry trends, share insights, and strengthen the team’s collective expertise.

**About you**
-------------


To thrive in this role, we believe that you are a passionate individual who is knowledgeable in customer engagement models and AI technologies. You are an independent thinker who can collaborate effectively with diverse teams and communicate complex ideas clearly. Additionally, you are proactive in educating stakeholders about the value of data-driven solutions and are collaborative by nature.

### **You also have the following experience:**

* An advanced degree (MS/PhD) in **Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related fields-**
* **3+ years** of professional experience in data science or machine learning roles-
* Significant breadth and depth of statistics/ML knowledge.
* Proven experience building **customer engagement models** (e.g., churn prediction, customer lifetime value, and customer segmentation).
* Proficiency in **Python and SQL**, with experience using version control systems (ex: GitHub).
* **Experience presenting your work to non-technical stakeholders**, translating complex ideas into actionable insights.

### **Bonus qualifications:**

* Familiarity with **cloud-native technologies** and/or the **Google Cloud Platform**.
* Hands-on experience with **model deployment** and a solid understanding of **MLOps best practices**.
* Strong knowledge of **experimental design** and **A/B testing methodologies**.

**Why you should apply**
------------------------

* **High-Impact Projects**: Contribute to high-impact projects, including customer lifetime value and personalized content recommendations.
* **Cross-Functional Influence**: Partner closely with Marketing, Engineering and Product teams to develop models that guide critical business decisions.
* **Shape the Future**: Be a part of a mission-driven team that directly influences how people connect with stories worldwide.




**What we offer**
-----------------


Storytel offers a friendly, entrepreneurial and fast-moving work environment where new ideas and creativity are welcomed. At Storytel we trust our employees and believe in their autonomy. We believe in doing things in new ways and questioning old methods. The Storytel culture - characterized by being welcoming and helpful - is important to us. We value individual responsibility and having people grow alongside their peers.


We offer flexible working hours, opportunities for continuous learning and development, remote working possibilities, and flexible public holidays so you can celebrate what you truly believe in.

title: Azure Cloud Solutions Architect
description:
**About Redeploy Build**  

  

At Redeploy Build, we are cloud specialists. What we do is build and integrate best-in-breed cloud environments, steering clear of legacy constraints and “old-IT”.  

  

We help our clients within all areas of public cloud - from building, governing, migrating and optimizing our client’s cloud resources. Living by a “Cloud always, in all ways” motto, we always get things done and are not just another powerpoint-firm, rather getting our hands dirty and putting tech into practice. Learn more about us here.  

  

As a rapidly growing public cloud company, we understand that our success depends on the talents we choose to surround ourselves with. Now we are looking for a Azure Cloud Solutions Architect in Stockholm, Göteborg or Jönköping who wants to be a part of our continued success story. Maybe it's you?

  

  

**What it means to be a Azure Cloud Solutions Architect at Redeploy Build**  

  

As a Azure Cloud Solution Architect, you will be a crucial member of the team and hold a multifaceted role, assuming the responsibility of owning client relationships right from the project's inception to the finish line.  

  

From the initial dialogues with clients to project kick-off, this role demands a seasoned professional who can seamlessly transition from talking to product owners/management and take ownership of the design, architecture, and driving the technical delivery alongside the client and our skilled team. Your responsibilities will include following areas:

  

* **Client Relationship Ownership**: Establish and nurture relationships with clients, initiating crucial dialogues at the project's outset to gain a comprehensive understanding of their objectives and expectations.
* **Design and Architecture Ownership:** Take charge of the conceptualization and design phase, translating client requirements into robust and innovative Azure solutions.
* **Technical Delivery Leadership:** Drive the technical delivery process, collaborating closely with the team to ensure the seamless implementation of cloud solutions. Your expertise will be instrumental in achieving project milestones and exceeding client expectations. We also expect you to be hands on and code, deploy and document when needed.
  

**Who are you?**  

  

We believe that you have a passion for cloud architecture and that you enjoy creating value and solving problems for clients and businesses. You’re a natural leader and open-minded, positive, driven and a curious person who understands the power of team collaboration and sharing knowledge with others.  

  

**What experiences do you bring?**

  

* Experience in leading complex large-scale projects, particularly with enterprise customers or large organizations.
* A solid understanding of business operations and dynamics, allowing you to align technical solutions with overarching business objectives.
* Advanced knowledge and hands-on experience with Azure is essential, with additional public clouds such as AWS and GCP considered advantageous.
* A strong background in development, engineering or technical roles including hands-on experience with conceptualizing, strategizing, designing and architecting cloud solutions.
* Knowledge and practical experience of programming and Dev(Sec)Ops and Platform Engineering.
* Hands-on experience with IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) with bicep and/or terraform for example.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.
  

**And if you come with following experiences, you will stick out from the crowd!**

  

* Container management and microservices such as Kubernetes, Docker and Openshift.
* Data and Analytics such as Databricks, Snowflake, Azure Fabric and Power BI.

Developer Experience, Cloud Optimization, Machine Learning and FinOps framework.  
* *Even if you don’t perfectly match the role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe in diversity and inclusion and welcome all applicants with relevant experience and skills.*
  


 **What we offer**  

  

Being a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. We enjoy creative freedom with our projects, benefit from great work/life balance, and thrive in a company culture that is both collaborative and supportive. Everything we do at Redeploy is centered around the simple yet effective idea that we all chip in to ensure our success.  

  

To learn more about our benefits, scroll down  



**Location**


We have offices located in central Stockholm, Göteborg and Jönköping. As we encourage a mix of in-person and remote work to foster innovation and support work-life balance (and like to have fun together), we see that you are based in commuting distance to our any office locations.

  

**How to apply**  

  

We hope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Redeploy.


We are constantly recruiting, so submit your application as soon as you can by hitting the apply button. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel. Please submit your application using the form on our career website, or any website displaying a position with us.  

  

For any specific questions about the position, reach out to Talent Acquisition Manager Francisca Andersson.

  

We look forward hearing from you!

title: Cyber Security Vulnerability Assessment Engineer
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.


We are looking for an experienced Cyber Security Vulnerability Assessment and Pen Test Engineer based in Gothenburg, Sweden.

**The company:**  

The Boeing subsidiary Jeppesen is one of the largest software development companies in Gothenburg. We develop optimization solutions for the world’s leading airlines. We focus on innovation and continuous improvement to bring more value to our clients, and explore emerging technologies such as quantum computing, AI and big data analytics.  

At our office in central Gothenburg you will work in a one-of-a-kind software development organization with fascinating solutions that make a real difference to people around the world. You will be working in an agile learning organization, surrounded by a team of talented and creative colleagues who are dedicated to our customers. You will learn and broaden your perspective by working with 400 IT professionals from more than 30 different nations, as part of a global organization where you collaborate with customers and colleagues across the world. Most importantly, you will be expected to make a difference.

**Position Overview:**  

* Conduct comprehensive penetration testing and vulnerability assessments on a variety of systems, including Windows servers, Windows Machine, Citrix Workspaces, Cloud Services, Linux environments, and APIs.
* Utilize a wide range of penetration testing tools and techniques to identify and exploit vulnerabilities.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest security threats, vulnerabilities, and attack methodologies.
* Collaborate with development, operations, and security teams to address identified vulnerabilities.
 **What’s in it for you?**  

You will be joining one of the largest companies in the world which means access to a wide range of products, technologies, training and benefits.  

You will be able to work with colleagues and customers from all over the globe in an expanding and demanding business.  

You get the opportunity to work with the biggest airlines in the world and help them with their Crew and Network & Operations Management systems.

 **Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**  

* 4+ years of hands-on experience in penetration testing and vulnerability analysis.
* Proven expertise in Windows server, Linux, and API testing.
* In-depth knowledge of common vulnerabilities and exploits (CVEs).
* Proficiency in using various penetration testing tools (e.g., Metasploit, Nmap, Burp Suite, Nessus).
**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**  

* Strong understanding of network protocols, operating systems, and application architectures.
* Security certifications (e.g., OSCP, CEH, PEN TEST+) are a plus.
* Experience with cloud security, particularly AWS.
* Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell).
* Familiarity with source code review techniques.
* Understanding of frameworks like ISO 27001, NIST, CIS
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  

  

We put great emphasis on your personal characteristics. We value individuals who have:  

* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
* You take ownerships of issues and work well both independently and within a team
* You enjoy a variety of challenges of a highly technical nature
  

You’ll become a team member of the Cyber Defence Team. This team will be working closely with the PaaS- and SaaS-team, consisting of over 25 IT Infrastructure and application experts (globally). The team is today serving about 50 airline customers.

**Relocation:**  

Relocation assistance is not a negotiable benefit for this position. Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expense.


This position is hybrid. This means that the selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite 3 days a week. This is at the hiring team’s discretion and could potentially change in the future.

**Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.**


At Boeing, diversity, equity, and inclusion are enduring company values. We strive to live these values every day not only because it’s the right thing to do, but because our success depends on it. The company’s commitment to diversity and inclusion providing a work environment for all employees that is welcoming, respectful and equitable, with opportunities for personal and professional development.

 **Export Control Requirements:** Not an export control position **Equal Opportunity Employer:**


We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not accept unlawful discrimination in our recruitment or employment practices on any grounds including but not limited to; race, color, ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military and veteran status, or other characteristics covered by applicable law.


We have teams in more than 65 countries, and each person plays a role in helping us become one of the world’s most innovative, diverse and inclusive companies. We are proud members of the Valuable 500 and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. Applicants are encouraged to share with our recruitment team any accommodations required during the recruitment process. Accommodations may include but are not limited to: conducting interviews in accessible locations that accommodate mobility needs, encouraging candidates to bring and use any existing assistive technology such as screen readers and offering flexible interview formats such as virtual or phone interviews.

title: Senior UKG Pro / Ultipro HR Admin Functional & Integration Consultant
description:
**Start****ASAP****Duration****1-3 months**
  
**Our client is looking for a senior UKG Pro / Ultipro HR Admin Functional & Integration consultant**


The assignment is part time


Start: ASAP


End date: December 31. 2024

* **Design**  

Help with assessing our client’s processes in UKG Pro/Ultipro, Have a good understanding on use of UKG Pro / Ultipro APIs and should support with Postman collections  

Explain the limitations of UKG Pro / Ultipro APIs & support with field mapping  

SAP CPS, UKG Pro / Ultipro processes explanation - how data is processed in UKG Pro / Ultipro when a data is sent from SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central (EC)  

Provide an understanding of UKG Pro / Ultipro data model  

Provide an understanding of SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central (EC) data model - nice to have  

Responsible for requirement gathering and data mapping recommendations, Support with entity and field mapping(alignment between payroll and integration dependencies)  

Ability to lead the discussion/present the IT technicalities with the business (HR) users in the understandable way  

Result oriented, team player

**Build**  

Support with implementation of required configuration/enhancement of APIs (UKG Pro)  

Support with usage of UKG Pro / Ultipro APIs, support with Postman collections, support with unit testing and system integration testing  

Verifying unit test results in UKG Pro / Ultipro

**UAT**  

Support with preparation of UAT test cases along with functional consultant  

Support during UAT with trouble-shooting and defect fixing  

During UAT testing ensure it is aligned with payroll requirements  

Verify UAT test results and provide feedback  

Work with business and clarify UAT results  

Help with verifying defect fixes during UAT

**Data Migration**  

Share if any dependencies between the existing data with usage of APIs  

Help with harmonization of the data during data migration

**Cutover**  

Help with cut-over tasks preparation and flag dependencies

**Go-Live**  

Support with Go-Live activities and provide knowledge transfer to the client’s HR IT team.

 **Must haves:**


	+ Good experience with US Payroll processes
	+ Prior experience with Employee Central to UKG Integrations
	+ Good experience working with Employee Central and UKG Integrations using APIs, SAP Cloud Integration(SAP CI)
	+ Ability to lead the discussion/present the IT technicalities with the business (HR) users in the understandable way
	+ Result oriented, team player

title: Diagnostic engineer
description:
**Let's create the future together.**


At Volvo Cars, we believe that being curious and truly committed to understanding people is the key to future success. We are people who care about other people, working together to create new technologies and innovations for safe, sustainable and convenient mobility. Want to join us?

  


**Get to know us!**  

Energy Management department is a part of Electric Propulsion unit, we deliver:  

Electric Vehicle Charging


Energy transfer such as vehicle to grid and interaction, vehicle to home, vehicle to load as well as related solutions for cloud-based optimization of energy transfer  

Battery energy storage solutions  

Wallbox and electric vehicle interface  

Our mission is to make electric cars more accessible and appealing to a larger customer base.

  

  

**What Do We Offer?**  

The group 97570 is responsible for:  

Define diagnostic functionality requirement based on FMEA.  

Diagnostic monitoring strategies and concept.  

Develop and implement diagnostic functionality.  

Calibrate diagnostic function and measure performance.  

Verify and validate performance and requirements.

  

  

Our goal is to deliver functionality which provides comfortable ownership and high-quality diagnostics to support manufacturing- and vehicle service processes.

  

  

**What will you do?**  

Participate in system design and requirements discussions.  

Develop, review and keep diagnostic requirements updated for supplier and in-house software development.  

Engage in supplier discussion to ensure alignment with requirements.  

Participate in project meetings and cross-team meetings.  

Take ownership of software and feature quality issues, including root cause analysis and solutions.  

Perform system verification, test cases and conduct analysis of results.

  

  

In this task you will initially be focusing on testing and analysis, utilizing test bench set-up, HIL and test vehicles. You will also participate in vehicle expeditions.  



**Do you fit the profile?**  

We believe that you have at least a B. Sc. degree within engineering, preferably power electronics, embedded system, or equivalent competence. On top on this, you have some years’ experience in the automotive industry and have worked with testing activities within the same and familiar with testing tools and measurement systems. We are a global company so a must for us is that you are fluent in English.

  

  

**You should also have:**  

Experience of testing diagnostic events and services  

Knowledge of AUTOSAR diagnostic modules and bootloaders  

Knowledge about ISO 14229  

Knowledge about OBDII and other legal regulation & requirements  

Knowledge and understanding of simple HW-circuits

  

  

In this role, you need to be structured, data driven and have good documentation skills.  

You are also used to corporate and communicate with people.  

B-driving license

  

  

**How to learn more and apply**  

Please apply before November 15 2024 and note that we recruit continuously and therefore encourage you to apply as soon as possible and we do not accept any applications via e-mail due to GDPR. If you have further questions about the position, please contact Hiring Manager Jan Lindberg at Jan.Lindberg@volvocars.com, and for questions regarding the recruitment process contact recruiter Keerthi Veeraraghavan at keerthi.veeraraghavan@volvocars.com

  


**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 43,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.


#LI-KV1

title: Event Marketeer till Easyfairs
description:
**Vi söker nu tillfällig förstärkning till Easyfairs Nordics B2C avdelning, där du kommer att få jobba med ett av det mest spännande och kända varumärket på marknaden - vårt omåttligt populära varumärke Comic Con Stockholm, som är Nordens största event för populärkultur.**

**Dina arbetsuppgifter:**


Du kommer att ingå i ett sammansvetsat team på totalt nio personer, där alla hjälper och stöttar varandra i att uppnå vårt gemensamma mål att skapa oförglömliga upplevelser och minnen för alla våra besökare, stora som små. I din roll som Event Marketeer kommer framförallt arbeta med den digitala kommunikationen och marknadsföringen av eventen, samt tillsammans med projektledaren och andra Event Marketeers driva projekten framåt under stor frihet för egna idéer och lösningar. Du kommer också att arbeta med;

* Ta fram och implementera en marknadsplan för varje projekt tillsammans med Event Master
* Textproduktion
* Skapande av innehåll
* Grafisk design
* Stödja säljteamet genom att planera och genomföra säljaktiviteter
* Daglig administration och uppdateringar av systemen
* Blandade projektspecifika uppgifter
* Genomföra mässor

**Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som vill vara en del av en verksamhet som ständigt utvecklas och förändras. Du bör ha en fallenhet för att skriva texter till våra webbsidor och nyhetsbrev, samt ett öga för det grafiska. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en stjärna inom digital marknadsföring och ha förmågan att utveckla och optimera vår kommunikation och marknadsföring. Vi söker en person som är självgående, ansvarstagande och har en positiv inställning. Du kommer att behöva ha ett organiserat och tidseffektivt arbetssätt då detta ofta är en miljö med högt tempo. Du bör även vara en kommunikativ person och ha förmågan att bygga goda relationer, då du kommer ha kontakt med många olika människor i rollen. Utöver detta ser vi att du;


* Har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom kommunikation, marknadsföring eller liknande
* Erfarenhet från liknande arbete i en event- och marknadsroll
* Behärskar både svenska och engelska obehindrat. Kunskaper i Danska är ett stort plus.
* Erfarenhet och god kompetens inom flera av följande: InDesign, Photoshop, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Canva, Wordpress, e-postmarknadsföring, sociala medier och SEO.
* Du bör även ha ett intresse och kunskap inom det breda området populärkultur (spel, TV, film etc.) samt asiatisk kultur

**Vad vi erbjuder dig**


Vi tror på teamwork! I gengäld erbjuder vi en arbetsplats som är starkt dynamisk, med spännande utmaningar som skiftar med våra olika mässkoncept – den ena dagen är definitivt inte den andra lik. Men vi värderar också att ha roligt, ett av våra företagsvärderingar är just det – att ha kul på jobbet. Utöver detta erbjuder vi även;

* Fast lön med bonusmöjligheter
* Friskvård en timma i veckan samt friskvårdsbidrag
* Flexibelt arbete med tre fasta dagar på kontor
* Kollektivavtal enligt Almega Unionen

**Övrig information**


Tjänsten är ett tidsbegränsat vikariat på drygt ett år, med önskat startdatum senast den 1 december 2024 och fram till årsskiftet 2025/början av januari 2026. Möjlighet till tillsvidareanställning kan bli aktuellt efter vikariatet, beroende på verksamhetens behov och framtida förutsättningar.

**Mer om Easyfairs**


Easyfairs Nordic är en del av Easyfairs Group, ett av Europas ledande mässföretag med huvudkontor i Bryssel. Easyfairs arrangerar 200 evenemang i 14 länder och driver 8 anläggningar i Beneluxländerna och Skandinavien. Easyfairs Nordic har två affärsområden; mässhallarna Kistamässan och Malmömässan samt mässorganisationen som bedriver mässor i Finland och Sverige.


Easyfairs strävar efter att vara mötes- och mässbranschens mest innovativa, flexibla och effektiva arrangör. För att nå detta mål anställer vi engagerade medarbetare och jobbar efter kärnvärdena Creative Entrepreneurship, Integrity, Result Driven and Having Fun.


Läs mer om Easyfairs Nordic och Easyfairs globalt på vår hemsida: www.easyfairs.com

* Hands-on experience with IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) with CloudFormation, CDK and/or terraform for example, version control systems (e.g., Git), and CI/CD pipelines.
Fluency in Swedish and English.  
* 

**And** **if you come with following experiences, you will stick out from the crowd!**

  

* Well-Architected Framework, Landing Zones and Cloud Governance
* Container management and microservices such as Kubernetes, Docker and Openshift.
* Data and Analytics such as Databricks and Snowflake

Developer Experience, Cloud Optimization, Machine Learning and FinOps framework.  
* 

*Even if you don’t perfectly match the role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe in diversity and inclusion and welcome all applicants with relevant experience and skills.*  

  

  

**What we offer**  

  

Being a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. title: Application Security Manager
description:
Välkommen till Svenska Spel, techbolaget i spelbranschen som sätter säkerhet och trygga spelupplevelser i främsta rummet. Med ett av världens mest avancerade spelsystem, som hanterar miljontals transaktioner varje dag, så krävs det att IT-säkerheten är på topp och i framkant. Nu finns chansen att bli en del av det starka team som arbetar med cyber- och IT-säkerhetsfrågor, i rollen som Application Security Manager.  



  

**Vad kommer du att göra?**  

Du arbetar med att skydda vårt hjärta, spelsystemet, vilket innebär att säkra mjukvara, integrationer och källkod från potentiella hot och sårbarheter. Viktiga ansvarsområden är att genomföra säkerhetsbedömningar, integrera säkerhetsrutiner i programvaruutvecklingens livscykel och säkerställa efterlevnad av säkerhetsstandarder.


Du är en stark spelare inom metoder för applikationssäkerhet och är en ambassadör för att sprida kunskap och förståelse inom området. Du kommer arbeta tvärfunktionellt med många kontaktytor inom både tech och affär. Denna roll kräver utmärkt problemlösningsförmåga och förmåga att utbilda och vägleda våra utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa säkra kodningsmetoder.


Ett axplock av tjänstens ansvarsområde:


* Utveckla, implementera och följ upp principer, standarder och procedurer för applikationssäkerhet
* Bevaka och agera på säkerhetsincidenter relaterade till området
* Förbereda och presentera rapporter om risk- och hotbild samt eventuella incidenter
* Tolka och omsätta krav och riktlinjer till specifika rutiner, instruktioner och processer gällande mjukvaruutveckling
* Inom området operativt arbete; granska lösningsförslag, applikationer eller system samt ge konkret rådgivning och dokumentation kring hur krav ska implementeras ur ett säkerhetsperspektiv
* Säkerställa efterlevnad av beslutade rutiner och processer samt utföra intern kontroll i den löpande verksamheten

  

**Är du den som kommer att göra det?**
  

Du är en kommunikativ och ödmjuk person som prioriterar samarbete för att tillsammans hålla en hög nivå av säkerhet och ansvar. Du deltar aktivt i Svenska Spels forum och communities samt omvärldsbevakar för att hålla dig uppdaterad och ständigt arbeta med förbättringar.


Du har en mycket god förmåga att identifiera och hantera säkerhetsrisker och incidenter, och kan kommunicera säkerhetskrav och risker på ett pedagogiskt sätt till olika målgrupper runt om i bolaget. Med en positiv syn på förändring och uppmuntrar till aktivt deltagande vid implementering och utvärdering av nya förutsättningar. Du är en förebild när det kommer till att dela med dig av insikter och kunskap och likväl som att lyssna in dina medarbetares perspektiv.  

  

Utöver detta har du också:

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med säkerhet i mjukvaruutveckling av produkter och tjänster
* Kunskap om säkerhetssystem och verktyg som identifierar och mitigerar hot och sårbarheter i kod och mjukvara genom hela mjukvarulivscykeln
* Erfarenhet av implementationer av och arbete med säkerhetskoncept i olika tekniska miljöer
* Flytande språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift


Det är meriterande om du har:

* Certifieringar som CISSP (Certified Information Systems Security Professional), CISM (Certified Information Security Manager), eller CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker)
* Erfarenhet av cloud-säkerhet (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)

  

**Om Tech på Svenska Spels**  

På Svenska Spel hanterar vi 10 000 000 transaktioner varje dag, året runt och på sex dagar har vi hanterat samma transaktionsvolym som den största pengaöverföringsappen gör på en månad. Varje dag utvecklar, driftar och supportar vi ett av världens mest avancerade spelsystem, vi är med andra ord ett techbolag som sysslar med spel - inte tvärtom. Och som ett techbolag som sysslar med spel kommer ett ansvar, både för folks drömmar och spänning, men även för deras spelande. Det är också därför du kommer märka att vårt spelansvarsarbete genomsyrar hela företaget från första dagen du börjar jobba hos oss.

 **Vi är Svenska Spel**
  

Vi är modiga, nyfikna och vi strävar efter enkelhet i allt vi gör. Vi vill att spel ska vara till glädje för alla – för våra medarbetare, kunder och gäster, för idrotten och för samhället i stort. Vi sponsrar idrottsrörelsen på alla nivåer, förebygger spelproblem och låter vinsten gå tillbaka till samhället.


Är du nyfiken på våra förmåner? Då hittar du dem här:

 **Ansökan och kontaktuppgifter**
  

Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med placering på något av våra kontor i Solna eller i Visby, eller från någon annanstans i Sverige om det fungerar bäst. På Svenska Spel gör vi jobbet där det passar bäst.


Vi utför intervjuer och urval löpande så tveka inte med att skicka in din ansökan redan idag.


För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Tonny Hultberg, Tonny.Hultberg@svenskaspel.se


För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Team Talent Acquisition, teamta@svenskaspel.se
company_description: På Svenska Spel gör vi jobbet där det passar bäst. Det kan antingen vara på något av våra kontor i Solna, Visby eller Göteborg. Eller någon annanstans. Där du mår bäst presterar du bäst, helt enkelt.

title: AWS Cloud Specialist
description:
**About Redeploy Build**
 At Redeploy Build, we are cloud specialists. What we do is build and integrate best-in-breed cloud environments, steering clear of legacy constraints and “old-IT”.
   

  

 We help our clients within all areas of public cloud - from building, governing, migrating and optimizing our client’s cloud resources. Living by a “Cloud always, in all ways” motto, we always get things done and are not just another powerpoint-firm, rather getting our hands dirty and putting tech into practice. Learn more about us here.
   

  

 As a rapidly growing public cloud company, we understand that our success depends on the talents we choose to surround ourselves with. Now we are looking for an AWS Cloud Specialist in Stockholm or Gothenburg who wants to be a part of our continued success story. Maybe it's you?
   

  

**What it means to be a AWS Cloud Specialist Consultant at Redeploy Build**
 As an AWS Cloud Specialist, you will be at the forefront of assisting and mentoring mid-sized and enterprise scale clients in optimizing their AWS infrastructure. With your expertise in AWS platforms and architecture, you’ll provide insights into best practices, emerging technologies and industry trends to help our clients make informed decisions.
   

  

 In this role you’ll be working closely with cross-functional teams including developers, cloud-teams and business stakeholders to align AWS cloud infrastructure initiatives with organizational goals, as well as getting your hands dirty implementing tailored AWS cloud solutions.
   

  

 Some of your tasks will for amongst others be:
   

  

* Leading advanced technical implementations within your area of expertise.
* Understand and align infrastructure initiatives with business objectives, demonstrating a keen understanding of the broader organizational context.
* Act as a mentor and pre-sales resource for your area of expertise.


**Who are you?**
 We believe that you have a passion for cloud development and that you enjoy creating value and solving problems for clients and businesses. You’re open-minded, positive, driven and a curious person who understands the power of team collaboration and sharing knowledge with your fellow colleagues and our clients.
   

  

**What experiences do you bring?**
* Extensive experience and expertise in infrastructure technologies, including cloud computing, networking, virtualization, and containerization.
* Ability to understand and align infrastructure initiatives with business objectives, demonstrating a keen understanding of the broader organizational context.
* Hands-on experience with IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) with CloudFormation, CDK and/or terraform for example, version control systems (e.g., Git), and CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams.
* A proactive and curious attitude towards learning new technologies and methodologies.
* Great communication skills, both verbal and written in Swedish and English, to effectively convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


**And** 
**if you come with following experiences, you will stick out from the crowd!**
* Well-Architected Framework, Landing Zones and Cloud Governance.
* Container management and microservices such as Kubernetes, Docker and Openshift.
* Data and Analytics such as Databricks and Snowflake
* Developer Experience, Cloud Optimization, Machine Learning and FinOps framework.


 🤝
 **What we offer**
 Being a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. We enjoy creative freedom with our projects, benefit from great work/life balance, and thrive in a company culture that is both collaborative and supportive. Everything we do at Redeploy is centered around the simple yet effective idea that we all chip in to ensure our success.
   

  

**To Learn More About Our Benefits, Scroll Down 👇🏼**
 📍
 **Location**
 We have offices located in central Stockholm, Göteborg and Jönköping. As we encourage a mix of in-person and remote work to foster innovation and support work-life balance (and like to have fun together), we see that you are based in commuting distance to our any office locations.
   

  

 📩
 **How to apply**
 We hope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Redeploy.
   

  

 We are constantly recruiting, so submit your application as soon as you can by hitting the apply button. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel. Please submit your application using the form on our career website, or any website displaying a position with us.
   

  

 For any specific questions about the position, reach out to Talent Acquisition Manager Francisca Andersson.
   

  

 We look forward hearing from you!

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Us**
 Sinch is a global leader in cloud communications, helping businesses connect with their customers on their mobile phones. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year. Our technology powers the world's leading communications platforms.
   

  

 We are looking for Tech Lead Manager to join the team in Stockholm office.
   

  

**The essence of the role**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people and developing code. In this role, you will lead a team of developers. We have developers in many parts of the world but are working on consolidate them to Stockholm.
   

  

 You will also collaborate with your Product partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented

title: Property Systems Support Specialist
description:
**Hotel Distribution Systems, Connectivity and Customer Service are no alien words to you?**
 Join BWH Hotels, where we celebrate what makes each of our hotels unique and the special experiences they offer. As a global hotel chain, we are all about going the extra mile to support our hotels and help them to deliver top-notch guest experiences.
   

  

 Right now, we are looking for a service-savvy superstar who is eager to help our hotels conquer the world of Property and Distribution Systems.
   

  

 If you thrive on making a difference, value personalized service and have a passion for all types of systems we want you to become our next
 **Property Systems Support Specialist.**
**Do you have previous experience with reservations and booking systems and are you now ready to take the next step by supporting and navigating our hotels through the maze of Systems? Would you like to describe yourself as hands-on and pro-active?**
 If the answer is Yes – look no further and apply to become BWH’s next
 **Property Systems Support Specialist** 
 .
   

  

 As
 **Property Systems Support Specialist** 
 you are part of the Technology and Distribution Team based in Stockholm.
   

  

 As a person you are a creative problem solver, and you have a passion for all types of systems.
   

  

 You are someone who naturally likes to find solutions, has no difficulty in connecting the dots and likes to help people in any way. In your view, obstacles are only opportunities in disguise.
   

  

 You enjoy working as part of a dynamic team which not only strives to succeed but also values collaboration and celebrates achievements together. You are a team player, pro-active and you like to go the extra mile.
   

  

**Your superpowers**
* 2-3 years’ experience in hotel operations / hotel reservations and/front office or booking systems
* In depth knowledge of at least one PMS system: Opera | Opera Cloud, Hotsoft, Suite8 or Mews
* Experience in a helpdesk or customer/guest service environment
* Confident to set up and hold training and webinars for our hotels
* Communicate fluently in Swedish and English


**Your tasks as a Property Systems Support Specialist**
* Provide day-to-day support to hotels with any questions related to property and distribution systems
* Play a supporting role during the onboarding of a new BWH franchise property or PMS and complete distribution related tasks during the integration phase of a new Hotel/PMS
* Facilitate and hold trainings/webinars and be the hotel’s go-to person during the first months as a BWH franchise property
* Continually observe day-to-day system status and assure BWH hotels are bookable in all BWH systems and booking channels (OTA, GDS, Brand Web, Direct Connects)
* Assists in the development and documentation of standard operating procedures (SOPs), work instructions, training materials, and checklists
* Take ownership of assigned products and projects


**BWH Hotels Scandinavia – local gems everywhere in Scandinavia**
 BWH Hotels is a leading global hotel network consisting of Best Western Hotels & Resorts, WorldHotels Collection and Aiden by Best Western.
   

  

 Best Western Hotels & Resorts (BWHR) is an iconic hotel chain with over 70 years of experience. Today, BWHR comprises 10 brands with 3- and 4-star hotels.
   

  

 Aiden by Best Western offers a new generation of hotels for the smart and informed guest that seeks convenience and effective solutions while traveling.
   

  

 WorldHotels boasts an impressive collection of unique and exclusive hotels and resorts in various destinations worldwide. BWHR, Aiden and WorldHotels offer a hotel portfolio with options in every market segment – from economy to luxury.

title: Team Manager - Online Fraud Prevention
description:
**Job Description**
 To provide a secure, trustworthy, and always available experience to our customers, we are now transforming the way we address the continuously evolving and complex cyber security threats and risks. To do this we have created a new Tech Centre focused solely on managing Cyber Security for all our brands and majority investments. Within this Cyber Security Tech Centre, we have a unit that focuses on Cyber Security Engineering, with the mission to protect our customers, colleagues, and company by establishing and managing safe and secure technology use.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to lead one of our Global Engineering teams, focused on Cyber crime and
 **Online Fraud Prevention** 
 to drive our delivery and services portfolio throughout the whole H&M Group and all our brands. You will report to the Head of Cyber Security Engineering Unit.
   

  

 We are looking for a strong
 **Manage** 
 r and principal leader within B2C Online e-commerce Fraud prevention who can drive our delivery and services portfolio.
   

  

 You will ensure that core capabilities are in place to manage Cybercrime, online Fraud and Loss prevention. You will grow and mature the internal and external organisation, from individual team members to our managed services partners. You will drive risk management work related to the Cybercrime area, improve the security posture to meet current and emerging threats, and proactively work with compliance to policies and regulations. More specifically you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Manage day-to-day activities of the Online Fraud Prevention team, ensuring operational and performance objectives are met.
* Spear-head team-level budgeting, planning, and roadmap initiatives.
* Cultivate professional development within the team to ensure relevant skills and qualifications.
* Navigate stakeholder relationships to align Fraud Prevention with business needs, regulatory requirements, and company policies.
* Contribute to the Cyber Security strategy and ensure team alignment.
* Respond to audit findings, prioritize remediation measures, and manage your team's budget, including staff, contracts, and technology.
* Identify demands, objectives, and key results, defining and monitoring supporting KPIs and metrics.
* Ensure the availability, stability, and performance of Cybercrime and Online Fraud prevention services.
* Assess and manage risks to the effectiveness of platforms and services, protecting against current and emerging threats.


**Qualifications**
 We envision you as a seasoned leader with experience in a Leadership role, preferably within retail or e-commerce, deploying modern technologies in large, complex organizations. Key attributes include:
   

  

* Have a background in leading online e-commerce Fraud Prevention teams for B2C, specializing in areas such as payments fraud, chargeback rates reduction, discount abuse, gift card abuse, account takeovers, and e-commerce fraud attacks.
* Creative and critical thinking, offering ideas and solutions to ongoing challenges.
* A track record of successful Cybercrime, Online Fraud, and Loss prevention deliveries in complex global environments.
* Experience in leading a team that designs, implements, and deploys Cybercrime and Online Fraud prevention solutions.
* Working hands-on experience in areas such as cybercrime, online fraud, loss prevention, cyber forensics investigations, or proactive pattern recognitions.
* End-to-end project delivery experience with hands-on involvement in product development for Cybercrime and online Fraud prevention.
* Experience with at least one major cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Leadership understanding of team dynamics and staff personal development.
* Beneficial certifications: CISSP, CISM, CompTia Security+, Identity Management Institute (IMI) certifications.


 Above all, we value your passion, pride in achievements, and the ability to share this enthusiasm with your colleagues.
   

  

**Additional Information**
**Working with tech at H&M Group**
 Shaping the future of fashion with people, data, and tech. The fashion and retail industries are going through a transformation, driven by customers' technology and sustainability expectations. At H&M Group, we want to shape the future of fashion and lifestyle by harnessing the power of smart tech and data. With our 74-year history of innovation, we understand the need to collaborate and co-create with engineers and tech specialists around the world to achieve our vision.
   

  

**What we offer!**
 You are joining a unique value-driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, flexible work life, learning communities, wellness benefits, parental benefits etc. There are endless opportunities to experiment and grow in any direction that you want, and when you grow, we grow. Being a major player gives us countless opportunities to make a real impact and shape the future.
   

  

 This is a full-time position with placement in Stockholm

title: Infrastrukturspecialist
description:
Är du en strukturerad och serviceinriktad person som drivs av problemlösning? Motiveras du av att arbeta med moderna system och den senaste tekniken samt har en passion för IT-utveckling? Vill du även arbeta på ett bolag som genomsyras av stark entreprenörsanda där du får vara med och påverka, utveckla och bidra tillsammans med härliga och inspirerande kollegor? Då kan rollen som Infrastrukturspecialist med fokus på klient hos oss på Svedea vara rätt utmaning för dig!
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Som Infrastrukturspecialist hos oss på Svedea blir du en del av vårt infrastrukturteam som i dagsläget består av två infrastrukturspecialister, en supporttekniker och en chef. Vi förvaltar en mångfacetterad infrastruktur bestående av ca 30 servrar, nätverk och molntjänster. Dessutom befinner vi oss på en spännande resa mot en förflyttning till molnet med hjälp av moderna verktyg i Azure.
   

  

 Du kommer att bli en nyckelspelare i vårt fortsatta arbete med att implementera moderna och säkra system som också är förvaltningsbara över tid. Utöver flytten av vår infrastruktur till Azure kommer fokus den närmaste tiden vara att arbeta med automation för att effektivisera förvaltningen, införande av en ny nätverksdesign samt implementering av säkerhetsförebyggande åtgärder och riskhantering enligt DORA-förordningen.
   

  

 I rollen kommer ditt huvudsakliga ansvar vara att:
   

  

* äga och förvalta vår klientplattform som innefattar våra 300 användare på pc, Mac och VDI
* driva det fortsatta utvecklingsarbetet för att modernisera vår infrastruktur, samt förbättra våra arbetsprocesser


 Du kommer samarbeta tätt med våra 1st line supporttekniker, systemutvecklare och arkitekter. Utöver detta är kontakten med externa infrastrukturleverantörer av högsta vikt för att få vägledning kring hur verktygen och produkterna kan integreras och användas för att tillföra största möjliga värde för Svedea.
   

  

 Tjänsten är på heltid med start enligt överenskommelse. Tjänsteort är Stockholm eller Umeå.
   

  

**Din bakgrund**
 På Svedea lägger vi stor vikt vid personlighet och potential. Som person är du serviceinriktad och trivs med att hjälpa andra genom att hitta lösningar på komplexa utmaningar. Du arbetar strukturerat och har förmågan att prioritera dina arbetsuppgifter, vilket gör att du kan hantera flera parallella uppgifter samtidigt. Du drivs av problemlösning och ser utmaningar som möjligheter att förbättra processer, vilket bidrar till teamets och verksamhetens framgång.
   

  

 Andra krav för tjänsten är att du har:
   

  

* minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom IT-infrastruktur, där du har arbetat som systemadministratör, systemtekniker eller motsvarande (ej enbart IT-support)
* god kunskap inom IT-infrastruktur med system och plattformar såsom Intune, Microsoft365 och Windows Server
* grundläggande säkerhetsförståelse
* mycket goda kommunikationsfärdigheter, både på svenska och engelska, såväl tal som skrift


 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* relevant eftergymnasial utbildning
* nätverkskunskap
* erfarenhet av PowerShell/Scripting, Azure och Infrastructure as code (IaC)


**Vi erbjuder dig**
* En stimulerande och dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du får möjlighet att arbeta med spännande projekt och teknik
* Möjlighet att växa och utvecklas i din professionella karriär genom att arbeta tillsammans med erfarna kollegor och delta i interna och externa utbildningar.
* Bra förmåner och 5000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag
* En inspirerade företagskultur som kännetecknas av laganda med passionerade och engagerande kollegor som förstår vikten av att hjälpas åt och att ha kul tillsammans. Mer om vår kultur hittar du här!
* Möjlighet till visst distansarbete för att kunna balansera privat- och arbetsliv
* Fantastiska kontorslokaler centralt belägna, spana in våra kontor här - Stockholm och Umeå!


**Låter det intressant?**
 Välkommen med din ansökan! Vi arbetar löpande med urval så vänta inte utan skicka in din ansökan redan idag, sista ansökningsdag är den 15 november. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Observera att vi enbart tar emot ansökningar via länken i annonsen. Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Tf Chef Infrastruktur Ricard Sörman, mejl: ricard.sorman@svedea.se eller tel: 070-622 27 22. Har du frågor om processen är du välkommen att kontakta HR, Helena Andersson, mejl: helena.andersson@svedea.se eller tel: 073-598 51 93.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Om Svedea**
 Svedea är en framgångssaga. Våra första fjorton år har gjort oss till det ledande bolaget inom försäkring av fritidsfordon som motorcykel, båt och snöskoter och vi är en stark utmanare inom bil-, djur- och företagsförsäkring. Idag har vi omkring 400 000 kunder och fortsätter att växa snabbt.
   

  

 Vår vision är att förändra försäkringsbranschen och vi strävar efter att våra kunder ska tycka att försäkring är enkelt. Hemligheten bakom vår framgång är engagerade medarbetare som trivs på jobbet i kombination med en tydlig företagskultur. Nu ökar vi tempot för att fortsätta växa, behålla de mest engagerade medarbetarna och de nöjdaste kunderna\*. Vår resa har bara börjat!
   

  

* Svenskt Kvalitetsindex (SKI) har tilldelat Svedea utmärkelsen Sveriges nöjdaste kunder i kategorin fordonsförsäkringar 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 och 2023 samt i kategorin djurförsäkring 2023.

title: Data Engineer - AWS, Redshift, Python & SQL
description:
**About Us**
 Sinch is a global leader in cloud communications, helping businesses connect with their customers on mobile phones. We facilitate over 147 billion conversations annually, reaching every phone on Earth. Our technology powers the world's leading communication platforms.
   

  

 We are a dynamic and innovative team seeking a passionate Data Engineer to collaborate on our data pipeline and data warehousing solutions.
   

  

 The working model is hybrid, and you can work from our Stockholm or Malmo office.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain scalable, resilient data pipelines using AWS services such as Lambda, Step Functions, Redshift, and S3.
* Improve and maintain the Redshift data warehouse solution.
* Manage the data lifecycle from ingestion and processing to storage and retrieval.
* Work with a range of different technologies and programming languages, with a primary focus on Python and SQL.
* Actively contribute to enhancing our data processes and pipelines.
* Take a hands-on approach to monitoring production environments, identifying issues, and being on-call when necessary.
* Engage closely with data scientists, software engineers, architects, DevOps specialists, and product managers to deliver exceptional data solutions.
* Build and maintain visualizations and dashboards in Tableau.


**Requirements**
* Capable of developing, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines for enhanced performance and reliability.
* Experienced professional in team-based software development and deployment.
* Skilled in using SQL for data querying and ETL/ELT development.
* Experienced in data warehousing (Redshift) and data modelling.
* In-depth knowledge of AWS services including Lambda, Step Functions, Redshift, and S3.
* Ability to work effectively within a cross-functional self-organizing team, fostering collaboration and mutual respect among team members.
* A passion for writing clean and efficient code.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Bachelor's degree in computer science, data engineering, or related technical discipline.


 Good to have
   

  

* Knowledgeable about various data architectures such as Data Lake, Data Mesh, and Data Fabric.
* Experience in data visualization tools.
* Knowledge in or willing to learn infrastructure as code using Terraform.
* Experience in a similar industry or related one.
* Proven ability to work with others to solve tough technical problems.
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment characteristic of agile development methodologies.
* Experience guiding and mentoring fellow engineers, empowering them to contribute effectively to team goals.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!

title: 2nd Line Support
description:
OM JOBBET
 
*Brinner du för IT och älskar att lösa tekniska problem? Vi söker en erfaren och engagerad Second Line Support som har en passion för att leverera högkvalitativ support och problemlösning.* 
  
 


 OM FÖRETAGET
 
 Kunden erbjuder flexibla, säkra och hållbara IT-lösningar som tar företag in i framtiden. Nyckeln till framgång ligger i ett fokus på kunderna och kärnverksamheten i kombination med den enskilde medarbetarens vidareutveckling. De trivs tillsammans och ser det som en självklarhet att dela med oss av kunskap, kompetens och insikter. 
 


 ARBETSUPPGIFTER
 
 Rollen som 2nd Line Support kommer du att vara en viktig del av ett team, där du hanterar användarstöd och tekniska lösningar i en dynamisk och växande IT-miljö. Som 2nd Line tekniker har du en central roll i att säkerställa support för kunders användare och deras IT-system. Du kommer att arbeta nära First Line-team, där du tar över och löser mer avancerade problem, samt stöttar vid implementation och drift av nya IT-lösningar.
 


* Felsökning, administration och hantering av ärenden relaterade till Microsoft 365, Azure, Active Directory och Intune.
* Hantering av klienter och enheter genom Microsoft Intune (MDM).
* Säkerställa säker och smidig driftsättning av nya enheter och applikationer.
* Underhåll och support av virtuella servrar och molntjänster.
* Drift och felsökning av nätverk (LAN/WAN).
* Arbeta med IT-säkerhet och identifiera säkerhetsrisker.
* Samverka med tredje part för att lösa mer komplexa tekniska problem.
* Dokumentation av processer, ärenden och lösningar i våra system.


 ERFARENHETER OCH EGENSKAPER 
 * Erfarenhet från 2nd Line support, eller långvarig erfarenhet från 1st Line support och redo att ta nästa steg.
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande.
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* B-körkort då resor kan förekomma.


  
   

**OM D-SOURCE** 

*Your source to IT*
 D-Source är ett modernt konsultbolag med bredden mellan helpdesk, infrastruktur och Tech. Vi har lång erfarenhet av att förstå kunders IT-behov! Tveka inte att höra av dig om du är intresserad av att ta reda på mer.
 



 Vad kan vi göra för dig och vad kan vi göra tillsammans?
 



  




**INGET JOBB FÖR DIG?** 

 Lugnt! Du kan alltid registrera dig förutsättningslöst på D-Source jobbsida genom att Connecta med oss. Då hamnar du i vår kandidatdatabas och får koll på våra kommande aktuella tjänster.

title: Data Scientist (AI & Cloud Solutions)
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled
 **Data Scientist** 
 to join our customers team and lead the end-to-end development of cutting-edge AI solutions. In this role, you will work on data pre-processing, model building, deployment, and maintenance within cloud environments like AWS and Azure.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and deploy AI solutions from start to finish
* Build and maintain data management systems
* Work with cloud services (AWS, Azure) and big data technologies like Databricks and Spark
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver on project goals
* Translate business needs into data science solutions and communicate effectively with stakeholders


**What You’ll Bring**
* 5+ years of experience with AI and data solutions
* Proficiency in Python, SQL, and experience with Java or Scala
* Experience with cloud services (AWS/Azure) and big data technologies
* Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive approach


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s/Master’s/Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
* Experience with end-to-end software development in cloud environments


 If you're passionate about AI, cloud computing, and innovation, we'd love to hear from you!
   

  

**Vi har Nordens största utbud av erfarna digitala marknadsförare**
 Vi hjälper kunder som vill utveckla sina digitala kanaler, har ett föränderligt kompetensbehov samt söker 100% flexibla, skalbara och kostnadseffektiva lösningar som de själva kan styra över.

title: Cloud Manager at FLIR
description:
Join us as a Cloud Manager and lead our Cloud Team!
   

  

 We’re seeking a Digital Solutions Cloud Manager to drive our Cloud Team to new heights!
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone with a strong background in product management and cloud solutions who thrives on leading teams to develop and deliver innovative cloud-based applications. If you’re passionate about aligning cloud development with strategic goals and ensuring seamless execution from concept to delivery, this is the perfect opportunity for you!
   

  

**Top Qualities We Value In Our New Cloud Manager**
 ✅ Expertise in cloud architecture (AWS or Azure)
   

  

 ✅ Proven leadership and product management experience
   

  

 ✅ Ability to foster team collaboration and drive innovation
   

  

**About The Job**
 As the Digital Solutions Cloud Manager at Teledyne FLIR, you will take on a pivotal role in shaping the direction of our cloud products. Your primary responsibility will be to bridge the gap between business objectives and technical implementation, ensuring our cloud solutions meet both market needs and organizational goals. You will lead a talented team, prioritizing projects, managing timelines, and working closely with stakeholders to deliver exceptional cloud applications.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead the Cloud Engineering Team: Mentor and manage a high-performing engineering team, ensuring they thrive in an agile environment. Provide leadership from development to deployment while fostering collaboration across the company.
* Define and implement cloud strategies: Partner with department leaders to shape the cloud vision, ensuring all technical solutions align with architectural and strategic business goals.
* Oversee the full development lifecycle: Manage the process and guide the team from requirements gathering to design, implementation, testing, and delivery of our cloud solutions.
* Drive agile processes: Help define and streamline Agile software development methodologies to maximize efficiency, collaboration, and success.


**About You**
 We are seeking a leader who excels in product management and has a clear understanding of how to drive cloud development projects from concept to delivery.
   

  

* Experienced in agile methodologies: You’re experienced in working within an Agile framework, adept at sprint planning, prioritization, and ensuring your team’s focus is aligned with product goals.
* Strong communication skills: You can clearly articulate product visions, manage expectations, and foster collaboration across multiple departments.
* Proven leadership skills: You have led engineering teams in an agile development process, guiding them from concept to production delivery. Experience as a product owner or manager is a plus.
* Technical Expertise: You have the technical skills necessary to guide your team in making sound engineering decisions, from development to deployment.
* Process-Oriented: You are experienced in leading processes from requirements through design, implementation, testing, and delivery.


 Why FLIR?
   

  

 At Teledyne FLIR, we are global leaders in thermal imaging and sensor technology, creating solutions that improve operational efficiency and safety across various industries. We are committed to nurturing innovation and supporting your growth. Join our dynamic work environment, where continuous learning and collaboration are key to success.
   

  

 Apply today and become an essential leader in developing cloud solutions that drive safety and sustainability technology.

title: Projektledare inom infrastruktur och anläggning
description:
**Stockholm är under ständig förändring. För att möta behovet av nästa generations infrastruktur krävs specialiserade konsulter med hög kompetens som kan leda utvecklingen. Därför söker Hifab projektledare med specialistkompetens inom infrastruktur och anläggning.** 
  

  

**Ditt nya jobb**
 Just nu arbetar vi bland annat med VA-utbyggnad på Dalarö och utvecklingen av Järva begravningsplats. Som projektledare hos oss får du hjälpa våra kunder att möta, hantera och implementera förändring samtidigt som du bidrar till Hifabs affär och utveckling. Du får även möjlighet till ett nära samarbete med andra avdelningar och grupper inom organisationen. Vårt Stockholmskontor ligger i norra Vasastan men vi jobbar flexibelt.
   

  

 Vi har kompetens och projekt inom bland annat ledningsteknik, betong, gatu-, spår-, mark- och infrastrukturprojekt. Våra prioriteringar som bolag är tydliga: Vi ska må bra, våra kunder är i fokus och vi tar ansvar för vår gemensamma utveckling. Med Hifab får du därför en arbetsgivare som arbetar aktivt för att skapa förutsättningar för detta på olika sätt.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Du är civil- eller högskoleingenjör och har minst fem års dokumenterad projektledarerfarenhet inom byggbranschen. Om du har erfarenhet från större projekt är det meriterande. Du motiveras av att arbeta i projektform och att utveckla nya- och befintliga kundrelationer. Som person gillar du att lösa problem och ser nya möjligheter i komplexa miljöer. Hos oss är det viktigt att det är kul när vi utvecklas och att vi tar ansvar för varandras utveckling.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Urval och rekrytering sker löpande så vänta inte med din ansökan. Vid frågor, kontakta:
   

  

 Shabnam Tavakoli, Affärschef Anläggning Stockholm
   

  

 shabnam.tavakoli@hifab.se
   

  

 070-442 22 93
   

  

**Hifab** 
 är ett konsultbolag inom fastigheter och samhällsbyggnad. Vi erbjuder oberoende rådgivning och ledning där vi hjälper våra kunder med strategi i förändring, ledning i projekt och tekniska tjänster i drift och förvaltning. Hifab grundades 1947, omsätter 300 miljoner och finns representerade över hela Sverige.

title: Product Owner with Salesforce Experience
description:
We are looking for a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Product Owner for a Scandinavian Airline. This is a one year contract consultancy.
   









 As a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Product Owner, you will lead the product intake, backlog prioritization, strategy, and roadmap of the Salesforce platform. Furthermore, you will lead the team with discovery to create a development-ready story to be handed off to the development team. Together with the team you will support marketeers throughout their journey building process.
 






* Set clear directions and prioritization on what value to deliver and collaborate with the team, as well as stakeholders to find the best solutions
* Create and own the team backlog, and be responsible for maximising the value of the product and the development commitment
* Collaborate with stakeholders to manage internal and external dependencies, and prioritise the backlog accordingly
* Facilitate and lead workshops to deliver both high-level and detailed level artifacts
* Proactively work with the other product owners
* Map out the dependencies and sequencing them, ensure that features go-live smoothly and successfully


 About you
 
 You’re passionate about digital marketing and developing solutions on top of the Salesforce ecosystem. You have a good understanding of best practices, functionality and capabilities of Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
 


* Salesforce Marketing Cloud development experience
* Product Ownership experience
* Agile framework experience










 About us
 




 We engage a Digital First mindset, encouraging a fail fast, learn fast environment with cross functional and agile teams focusing on fast delivery, quick iterations, and collaboration. We develop in-house products with usage of modern, innovative technologies allowing for freedom to bring in own ideas and creating a real impact. We offer an exciting setting surrounded by industry talent, where you are encouraged to challenge the status quo while simultaneously getting the support you need to develop your desired skills and expertise
 



 Purposeful: Be part of a historical transformation on a continuous journey to create a new and seamless way to travel, with opportunities to solve challenges that no one has cracked before
 



 Flexible: Office, Home, Norway, Copenhagen – wherever you are, Scandinavia is your home and flexibility is at our core
 



 Adventurous: We grow by making the world smaller. Discounted airline tickets providing you, your family and friends to travel the world at great prices.
 



 Personal: Opportunity to work on many customer & business challenges and initiatives
 



 Innovative: Building in-house development of products allows for freedom to bring in own ideas
 



 Ownership: Opportunity of bringing initiatives from ideas into end-point delivery
 



**About the assignment** 




 For this assignment (One year assignment from November 17 2024) you will be hired as a full-time consultant by Digitalenta. We offer our consultants a generous package including healthcare allowance, insurance policy, paid vacation days and pension savings. In addition, you'll also have a dedicated consultant manager available throughout your employment with us, in addition to optional networking activities with our network of consultants.

title: Process Engineer
description:
*Göteborg, Sweden* Apply until: **14 Nov 2024***At Nouryon, our global team of Changemakers takes positive action every day, to reach higher collectively and individually. We create innovative and sustainable solutions for our customers to answer society’s needs – today and in the future.*  

  

*We are looking for team members who bring ideas forward, champion others and work together to do better. Does that sound like you?*

**About the job**
-----------------


Join our team and drive projects as an expert engineer in your field. Define project scopes, manage uncertainties, and lead process engineering during plant commissioning and start-ups. You'll innovate with new process designs and RD&I information.  

If you are driven by developing with competent colleagues and new challenges, this might be the opportunity for you!  

This position requires some travelling and therefore you should have a willingness to travel abroad within Europe approximately 25% your time.

**In your future role as Process Engineer, you will**
-----------------------------------------------------

  

* Define, plan, manage and co-ordinate assigned project within EMEA’s production site and ensure safe execution and delivery within time, budget and quality.
* Translate regulatory requirements into new ways of working, standards and procedures, apply existing engineering standards, develop or contribute to the development of new guidelines.
* Carry out training of the customer's operations and maintenance staff
* Perform process design in projects including:
	+ Basis of design, flow sheeting, process flow diagram, heat and material balance
	+ Process calculations, sizing of equipment,
	+ Create and establish P&IDs (Piping & Instrument Diagrams)
	+ Preparation of functional descriptions of instrumentation and process control
	+ Execute or support risk assessments of new/existing installations/equipment and issue advice for needed changes at request or at own initiative
* Identify opportunities and make suggestions for improvement in production processes and design work, strategy of control, installations, equipment and working processes

**We believe you bring**
------------------------

* MSc Chemical Engineering or similar
* An extensive experience with chemical plant design
* A proved record of completed feasibility and study project phases
* Experience and knowledge in risk assessment
* Previous experience of Aspen Plus and Aspen Hysys.
* Fluent in English both spoken and written.

### 
**Great if you have**

* Knowledge of PHAST software for process hazard analysis
* Proficiency in Swedish language is an advantage


**We believe you are**
-----------------------


An individual that likes to dig into challenging projects with a collaborative and teamwork oriented approach. To be successful in this role, you also need to be result oriented and very flexible, with a fast response to change in cultural environment (business and/or geographical context). We also believe that you are driven by finding solutions and constantly seeking improvement.

**We offer you**
----------------


At Nouryon, we not only offer an exciting role and nice colleagues, but also benefits in addition to your salary. Nouryon has a collective agreement with IKEM, but in addition to that, we also offer unilateral benefits such as bonus, reduced working hours, health care allowance, lunch allowance and much more.

  

We offer an interesting working environment with highly skilled technical professionals. We succeed by working together in cross-functional teams where everyone is accountable and being part of our team gives you the opportunity to grow with challenging projects in an international environment.

**Have we got your interest?**
------------------------------


This is a permanent position on a full-time basis, reporting to Fabio Alese, Manager Process Engineering EMEIA, based in the Nordic Business center in Gothenburg.


Please apply via our online recruitment system. We will not accept applications via e-mail. Once it's with us we will review to see if we have a match between your skills and the role! For more information about our hiring process, visit: nouryon.com/careers/how-we-hire/  

  

We look forward to receiving your application!  

  

We kindly ask our internal candidates to apply with your Nouryon email via Success Factors.

**About Nouryon**
-----------------

  

We’re looking for tomorrow’s Changemakers, today.  

  

If you’re looking for your next career move, apply today and join Nouryon’s worldwide team of Changemakers in providing essential solutions that our customers use to manufacture everyday products such as personal care, cleaning, paints and coatings, agriculture and food, pharmaceuticals, and building products. Our employees are driven by the wish to make an impact and actively drive positive change. If that describes you, we will gladly make way for your ambitions. From day one we support you with your personal growth, through challenging positions and comprehensive learning and development opportunities, in a dynamic, international, diverse, and proactive working environment.  

  

Visit our website and follow us on LinkedIn.

**Contact**
-----------

  

  

For additional information about the vacancy please contact hiring manager Fabio Alese, fabio.alese@nouryon.com  

  

If you have any questions about the recruitment process or your application or need assistance, please contact: Recruiting.SE@Nouryon.com  

  

**For unions related questions please contact:**  

Akademikerklubben: Katarina Risö +46709577427  

Unionen: Helene Rosenlund, +46 708 21 18 39  

Ledarna: Sanna Backman, +46 709 57 71 03

  

  

**#WeAreNouryon**  

  

*We have already chosen our sourcing channels for this recruitment and kindly ask not to be contacted by any advertisement agents, recruitment agencies or manning companies.*
