title: Junior ETL Developer to bank in Stockholm!
description:
Are you an junior ETL developer eager to work with data - both building and analyzing? We are looking for you who are early in your IT career and wants to contribute to a Nordic Bank’s development of Market Abuse Surveillance solutions in Stockholm. Here’s your chance to take your first steps in your career and make a real impact to drive the bank towards a more digital and customer-focused future.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, 6 months with good chance of extension
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 As a Junior ETL developer, you will join the Software Development department within Group Functions Technology. You will work on backend development to create surveillance solutions aimed at detecting market abuse, insider trading, and market manipulation. The bank offer an inspiring international environment where you can grow both technically and personally while delivering value to the banks customers and stakeholders.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* An exciting role where you get the chance to grow and work with modern technologies as well as working at the largest financial group in the Nordic region and one of Europe's largest banks.
  
* You'll get the opportunity to join a global team of experts and learn from senior colleagues, as well as increase your skills as a Junior ETL Developer.
  
* The opportunity to develop and advance in your career. As well as working at a global company which value a sustainable workplace, work-life balance with remote work and a diverse workplace.
  
* A dedicated consultant manager from Academic Work who will support and coach you in your career. This is a long term assignment at our client and you'll have an ongoing employment at Academic Work.
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Collaborate closely with Product Owners and Solution Architects to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
  
* Design and develop high-performing ETL solutions for monitoring transactions and order flows.
  
* Implement industry best practices in data modeling and transformation.
  
* Work together with other developers to continuously improve the banks systems.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Has a Swedish citizenship or a valid long term work permit to start the position in Stockholm immediately.
  
* Skills in SQL and database technologies.
  
* Experience with data modeling and ETL tools.
  
* You are early in your career and have a strong interest in data, development of code and analyzing and preparing data.
  
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science / InformationTechnology
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* It's a bonus if you have knowledge or experience of using DataStage
  
* Experience from the bank industry
  
* Fluent in a Nordic language such as Swedish, Norwegian, Danish or Finnish due to your team being located in the Nordic.
  


  


 Knowledge can be gained through education, experience or self-taught.
 


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Supportive
  
* Social
  
* Responsible
  
* Intellectually curious
  


  


 As a person you have great problem-solving abilities and analytical mindset. Excellent communication skills and attention to detail is also of great value. We are looking for you who are interested in data, how it works and enjoy both analytical tasks as well as development of code and maintaining data. You are eager to learn DataStage as an ETL tool and grow with help from your senior colleagues.
 


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Milla Olsson or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stv2@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107705

title: iOS Software Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we are seeking an experienced iOS Developer to join one of our teams at the forefront of shaping innovative solutions and crafting modern digital products that positively impact people's lives across our organization. If this introduction sparks your interest, keep reading – the best is yet to come!
   

  

**Job Description:**
 Meet our team
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity to work on interesting problems together with talented peers in a cross-functional agile team. Here, you will create modern digital products that affect people’s lives for the better within PayPal globally.
   

  

 Your way to impact
   

  

 In this role, you will have the opportunity to work with skilled and highly motivated engineers specializing in backend, iOS, Android, and quality assurance to deliver a world-class experience for our users. You'll benefit from their extensive delivery experience, accelerating your learning journey and enabling you to contribute to exciting features and improvements in the Payment and Orders Experience areas, serving customers at scale across multiple geolocations.
   

  

 Your day to day
   

  

* You will help to deliver high quality solutions to our users.
* You will work as part of an agile team, planning, refining, delivering and inspecting sprint deliveries.
* You work closely with product and design to understand context and vision.
* You will learn and work with your peers in the iOS chapter to make incremental platform improvements and increase learning opportunities for all in a supportive environment.


 What you need to succeed
   

  

* Good experience in iOS development, with good knowledge of Swift.
* Familiarity with iOS SDK and various Apple's frameworks and understand how to leverage them effectively to build robust iOS applications.
* Understanding of common architectural patterns such as MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automation tools like Jenkins or Fastlane to streamline the build, test, and deployment process.
* Commitment to writing clean, maintainable code with a focus on code quality and experience with unit testing, integration testing, and UI testing.
* Keen interest in keeping up to date with the latest technological development.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.


 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0116674

title: Senior Test Engineer to a MedTech-company!
Test Automation Engineer
description:
Är du en erfaren teknisk testare som har ett driv att utvecklas och vill hjälpa våra kunder göra världen lite bättre genom digitala lösningar? Då kan du vara den vi söker.
   

  

 HiQ är utan tvekan ett av Sveriges mest tekniktunga och spännande konsultbolag med kunder inom en rad olika branscher såsom fintech, retail, fordon, myndigheter och telekom. Förutom att vi bidragit till utvecklingen av att snart bli ett kontantlöst samhälle, utvecklar vi även allt från digitaliseringen av elkraftsystem till framtidens autonoma fordon. Enkelt sagt, vi gillar att skapa sådant som förenklar och gör vardagen lite roligare för oss alla.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du få möjlighet att arbeta med testautomation i olika uppdrag. I arbetet kommer du bland annat bidra med att höja automatiseringsgraden genom att implementera och utveckla testautomatiseringslösningar och testfall hos våra kunder. Du bidrar även genom att ta nya grepp för att undersöka hur du kan testa mer effektivt.
   

  

**What You Have**
* Högskole-/Universitetsexamen inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap, datateknik eller motsvarande
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av testautomation
* Erfarenhet av programmeringsspråk som Java, C# eller Python
* Vi ser gärna att du arbetat med verktyg som t.ex. Selenium, Cypress, Postman, SOAP eller JUnit
* Flytande i svenska och engelska
* Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult är ett plus


**What You Get**
* Utmanande uppdrag både ute i våra kunders organisationer samt i vår egen regi, där HiQ har helhetsansvar för projekten.
* Möjlighet att delta i och leda utvecklingen av våra kunders framtida tjänster som förenklar människors vardag
* Kunniga kollegor som gärna delar med sig av sina kunskaper och erfarenheter
* En kreativ arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att utvecklas som människa, kollega och bli bättre på det du redan är bäst på!
* Du blir en del av ett värderingsstyrt bolag som värdesätter glädje och gemenskap och hittar på mycket roligt tillsammans.


 På HiQ arbetar personer med rätt attityd och rätt kompetens – det gör oss till ett smart, men också väldigt roligt gäng. Brinner du också för att förenkla och förbättra människors vardag genom digitala lösningar? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan i dag!

title: (Senior) Android Engineer
company_industry: Software Development and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Annapurna is collaborating with a leading tech company based in Stockholm. Their mission is to empower users with intelligent services that ensure safety from fraud, spam, and harassment, allowing them to focus on important conversations.
 



  





**The Role:** 
 As a Senior Android Engineer on the Calling Team, you will be essential in developing and improving core calling features for millions of users. You’ll work closely with a skilled team of Android engineers, ensuring high-quality code, excellent performance, and a seamless user experience. Collaboration is key, as you’ll partner with various teams to align with shared goals and enhance the overall product vision. This role offers a chance to make a significant impact while growing in a dynamic and supportive environment.
 



  





**Your Responsibilities:** 



* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and engineers to develop and A/B test new features using Agile practices.
* Lead tech initiatives to enhance code quality and maintain high engineering standards.
* Drive the adoption of best practices for Android development, setting the benchmark for quality.
* Share your knowledge and contribute to the continuous improvement of the platform.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Strong skills in writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code in Kotlin and Java.
* In-depth understanding of modern Android development across various device models and OS versions.
* Proficiency in RESTful APIs, Kotlin coroutines, automated testing, and dependency injection.
* A passion for learning, problem-solving, and continuous improvement.
* Fluency in English, both spoken and written.



**Preferred Skills:** 



* Experience with Jetpack Compose.
* Familiarity with MVP or MVVM architecture (both would be ideal).
* Interest in mentoring and coaching fellow developers



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* **Diverse, Collaborative Team:** 
 Work alongside talented colleagues from 35+ nationalities in a supportive, growth-oriented environment.
* **Comprehensive Benefits:** 
 Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible hours, health insurance, pension plans, parental leave, and continuous learning opportunities.
* **Office Culture & Flexibility:** 
 We prioritize in-person collaboration but offer flexibility. Enjoy a vibrant office atmosphere, engaging activities, and great perks like gym memberships and tech gear.

title: Senior Fullstackutvecklare Java
description:
*Är du en erfaren utvecklare med passion för Java som söker nya utmaningar? Vi söker en senior fullstackutvecklare som vill arbeta med både backend och frontend för att skapa framtidens innovativa lösningar.* 




  





**Om rollen** 




 Som senior fullstackutvecklare kommer du att arbeta i en dynamisk och stimulerande miljö där du får möjlighet att utveckla både backend- och frontendlösningar för våra kunder. Du kommer kunna vara delaktig i hela utvecklingscykeln, från kravställning och design till implementering och testning. En stark förståelse för Java och moderna Java-ramverk, samt erfarenhet av frontendutveckling med React eller Angular är viktiga kompetenser för rollen. Du kommer att samarbeta nära med både kunder och kollegor för att leverera högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar.
 



  





 Som konsult hos oss erbjuds du även möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och karriärutveckling i en organisation som värdesätter innovation och samarbete. Låter detta som något för dig? Sök rollen idag och bli en del av vårt växande team!
 



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har minst 8 års erfarenhet av Java/Java EE och djupgående kunskap inom ramverk som Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Micronaut eller Quarkus
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av frontendutveckling med React eller Angular
* Har erfarenhet av autentisering och auktorisering med IAM-system, OIDC, Spring Security och OAuth
* Har kompetens inom containerhantering och applikationsdistribution med Kubernetes (K8s) eller OpenShift
* Har förståelse för DevOps-principer och erfarenhet av CI/CD-verktyg som Maven, Gradle, Jenkins, GitLab CI eller TeamCity.
* Har erfarenhet av cloud-lösningar på Azure eller AWS
* Med kunskap om databaser som PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL och MongoDB
* Med kunskap om verktyg och teknologier som Kafka, ActiveMQ och Linux
* Extra meriterande är det om du har erfarenhet av utveckling inom CMS som AEM, Magnolia eller liknande. Branschkunskap inom bank eller offentlig sektor



  





**Som person tror vi du är:** 



* Ansvarsfull och självständig med ett starkt driv
* Kommunikativ med stark förmåga att uttrycka dig på både svenska och engelska
* Duktig på att förmedla komplex information på ett tydligt och lättförståeligt sätt
* Strukturerad och metodisk, med ett stort teknikintresse
* Kreativ problemlösare som trivs med att hantera utmaningar



  





**Mer om rollen** 




 Vi rekryterar löpande och ser gärna att du kan börja så snart som möjligt men månar om att hitta rätt person. Därför värderar vi dina personliga egenskaper och att vi trivs ihop högt.
 



  





 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta rekryterande chef Johan Boström på johan.bostrom@zingtongroup.com
 



  





**Om Zington** 




 Zington är ett konsultföretag med expertis inom Management, IT och Design. Vår resa började redan 2008 men idag är vi 250 medarbetare i Stockholm och fler än 4000 kollegor globalt inom VASS koncernen. Vi stöttar kunder som ex. Atrium Ljungberg, Axfood, Apollo och Fora i digital transformation genom att skapa tjänster, bygga lösningar och utforma strategier som driver affären framåt. På Zington ligger vår styrka i våra medarbetare. Oavsett om du är en specialist eller generalist kan vi som konsultföretag erbjuda dig en plats att växa och trivas på. Vi strävar efter att vara en plats där vi stöttar varandra, delar med oss av vår kunskap och utvecklas tillsammans. Vår framgång bygger på engagerade människor – när du växer, växer företag.
